dialogue_en: After careful consideration, I have devised a new name for this type of research.
dialogue_jp:
それらのデータを査定し
クラウドさんへの依頼項目を作成いたしました

dialogue_en: I call it..."world intel"!
dialogue_jp: 名づけて　『ワールドレポート』です！

dialogue_en: I hope you'll assist me in gathering relevant data by completing various tasks on your travels.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドさんには　世界中を冒険しながら
様々な依頼をこなしてもらいます

dialogue_en: In return, I will use the information you provide to develop new materia─quid pro quo.
dialogue_jp:
そうして得られたデータを活用し
新たなマテリアを開発できればと考えています

dialogue_en: To summarize, I want us to become research partners!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさんとボクの　共同研究というわけです

dialogue_en:
But before that, is there anything
you would like to ask?
dialogue_jp:
ワールドレポートについて
ほかに質問はありますか？

dialogue_en: These communications towers were built by the Republic of Junon─in order to further their understanding of the planet.
dialogue_jp:
通信塔は　ジュノン共和国が星の営みを
観測するために各地に建てた探索装置です

dialogue_en: They scan for all manner of signals...
dialogue_jp: あらゆるエネルギー反応を収集し

dialogue_en: which, in turn, reveal myriad locations of interest...
dialogue_jp:
希少なモンスターや
誰も知らない秘境や遺物といった

dialogue_en:
such as long-forgotten ruins
and rare natural phenomena.
dialogue_jp:
冒険に必要な
様々な情報を提供してくれるはずです

dialogue_en:
Should you happen to stumble across
a tower, please activate it.
dialogue_jp: 発見した際は　ぜひとも起動をお願いしますね

dialogue_en:
I must urge you to proceed with caution though.
Feral beasts often claim these installations as their territory.
dialogue_jp:
通信塔の周りには　モンスターが
棲みついていることが多いので　お気をつけて

dialogue_en: With a special pair of goggles, you can do battle in a virtual arena, regardless of your real-world location.
dialogue_jp:
ＶＲゴーグルを使うことで　場所に縛られず
どこでも模擬戦闘が行えるシステム

dialogue_en: That's the combat simulator!
dialogue_jp: それが　『バトルシミュレーター』です！

dialogue_en: Or my combat simulator, as Shinra developed the stationary models first.
dialogue_jp:
神羅の訓練用技術を拝借し
ボクなりにアレンジしてみました

dialogue_en: And fret not─it will never be obsolete.
dialogue_jp: 討伐依頼で得られたバトルデータを使って

dialogue_en:
I'll keep it up-to-date with intel
from unique enemy encounters.
dialogue_jp:
シミュレーターのほうも
バージョンアップしていくので　お楽しみに！

dialogue_en: I will also endeavor to implement all of the summons─once I finish analyzing the myths and legends surrounding them, of course.
dialogue_jp:
さらに　各地の神話や伝承を解析し
召喚獣も仮想空間上に再現していくつもりです

dialogue_en: In fact, after poring over stories from the grasslands...
dialogue_jp: すでに　グラスランドで語り継がれる伝説の巨人

dialogue_en:
I have finished implementing a new one:
the towering colossus known as "Titan."
dialogue_jp:
タイタンの召喚獣データは
解析を完了し　シミュレーターに実装しました

dialogue_en: Engage him at your leisure!
dialogue_jp: よければ　挑戦してみてください

dialogue_en: With a special pair of goggles, you can do battle in a virtual arena, regardless of your real-world location.
dialogue_jp:
ＶＲゴーグルを使うことで　場所に縛られず
どこでも模擬戦闘が行えるシステム

dialogue_en: Incredibly convenient, no?
dialogue_jp: それが　バトルシミュレーターです

dialogue_en: It can simulate battles with summons...
dialogue_jp: 召喚獣との戦いを再現したり

dialogue_en: and any unique fiends you've terminated─provided I've applied the latest update.
dialogue_jp:
討伐依頼で得られたバトルデータを使って
バージョンアップしていきますので

dialogue_en: Enjoy honing your skills!
dialogue_jp: ぜひ　挑戦してみてください

dialogue_en: With each piece of world intel you collect, you will also provide me with the data I need to develop new materia.
dialogue_jp:
冒険の依頼を達成することで取得した
様々なデータは　マテリア開発に使用できます

dialogue_en:
What I ultimately produce, however,
is for you to decide.
dialogue_jp:
どのマテリアを開発するかは
クラウドさん次第です

dialogue_en:
I look forward to finding out
what we can create together!
dialogue_jp:
いっしょに
新たなマテリアを生み出していきましょう

dialogue_en: In that case, I see no reason not to begin at once.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　早速マテリアを開発してみましょう

dialogue_en: With your activation of this tower, my analysis of the grasslands has already yielded some data.
dialogue_jp:
さきほど通信塔を起動したことにより
グラスランドの解析が　少しだけ進みました

dialogue_en:
Though hardly substantial, it is
enough for me to create materia.
dialogue_jp:
得られたデータを
どのマテリアの開発に利用するかは

dialogue_en: Which of these would you like?
dialogue_jp: クラウドさんが決めてください

dialogue_en:
I wish you all the best in the long journey
that lies ahead of you.
dialogue_jp: ではでは　世界を巡る冒険の始まりですね

dialogue_en:
And remember: you're not in this alone.
Should you require assistance, just ask!
dialogue_jp:
ボクも　精一杯サポートします
困った時は　いつでも声をかけてください

dialogue_en:
Do you happen to have any questions
about world intel and the like?
dialogue_jp:
ワールドレポートについて
ほかに質問はありますか？

dialogue_en: Which particular task would you like to learn about?
dialogue_jp: どの依頼について　お話ししましょう？

dialogue_en: And which particular task would you like to learn about?
dialogue_jp: 別：どの依頼項目について　お話ししましょう？

dialogue_en: While it is normal for creatures to adapt to their environment, sometimes these adaptations make them a threat.
dialogue_jp:
世界には　厳しい環境に適応し
独自の進化を遂げたモンスターたちが存在します

dialogue_en: I would like you to track down and eliminate these creatures─and amass data on them in the process.
dialogue_jp:
各地に生息する特異個体を発見　討伐し
データ収集をお願いします

dialogue_en: In certain remote areas, fragments of planetary wisdom have coalesced into crystalline forms.
dialogue_jp:
各地の秘境には　星の知識の断片が結晶化している
クリスタルがあるんです

dialogue_en:
Though the knowledge contained
within them is vast and varied...
dialogue_jp: 結晶体に詰め込まれた膨大な知識の中には

dialogue_en:
one subject is of particular interest to me:
that of summons.
dialogue_jp:
その土地で語り継がれている
召喚獣の情報が眠っています

dialogue_en: If you would analyze the crystals in my stead─thus extracting said knowledge from them...
dialogue_jp:
クリスタルを解析し
抽出した召喚獣のデータを流用することで

dialogue_en: I can use it to enhance our materia.
dialogue_jp: 召喚マテリアを　強化できるはずです

dialogue_en: Ah, yes! I was hoping you would ask!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん　よくぞ聞いてくれました！

dialogue_en: I detected some strange energy signals earlier.
dialogue_jp: 実は　未知のエネルギー反応を観測したんです

dialogue_en: My current theory is that they emanate from the remnants of ancient artifacts...
dialogue_jp:
エネルギーを発しているのは
過去の遺物と推測されるのですが

dialogue_en: But until we investigate, there's simply no telling what the sources might be!
dialogue_jp:
現時点では正体不明
近づけば　なにが起きるかわかりません

dialogue_en: And since we have yet to identify them, I have taken the liberty of naming these objects "protorelics."
dialogue_jp:
その物質は　まだ名前すらなかったので
『エンシェントマター』と名づけさせてもらいました

dialogue_en: A rather endearing name, if I may say so.
dialogue_jp: まさか名づけ親になれるなんて　感激です

dialogue_en: At any rate, I would be grateful if you could investigate said curiosities, and ultimately recover them for study.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドさん　ぜひともこの謎の遺物
エンシェントマターの調査と回収をお願いします

dialogue_en: This task requires you to search for objects which I believe to be the remnants of ancient artifacts.
dialogue_jp:
未知のエネルギーを発する
過去の遺物と推測される正体不明の物質

dialogue_en: Though what they truly are is anyone's guess! Ah, the suspense is killing me!
dialogue_jp:
名づけて　エンシェントマター！
近づけば　なにが起きるかわかりません

dialogue_en: While I do not want to rush you, I would like you to please keep them in mind during your journey.
dialogue_jp:
ぜひとも　この謎の遺物
エンシェントマターの調査と回収をお願いします

dialogue_en: Simply put, "lifesprings" are formed when the lifestream breaches the planet's surface.
dialogue_jp:
この世界には　ライフストリームが
湧き出ているスポットが　いくつも存在します

dialogue_en: To Shinra, the volume of mako that can be extracted from these springs is insignificant─certainly not worth the expense.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄エネルギーに転用するには小さすぎるため
神羅にとっては取るに足らない泉なのですが

dialogue_en: But to us, they are a veritable font of knowledge.
dialogue_jp: ボクたちにとっては　大切な星からの贈り物です

dialogue_en: In order to tap these precious reserves, however, you will first need to find them!
dialogue_jp:
そんなライフスポットを調べることで
新たな知見を得られるはずです

dialogue_en: If you still have questions about world intel, please─ask away.
dialogue_jp:
冒険の依頼項目について
ほかに質問はありますか？

dialogue_en:
Any questions about world intel?
Don't be shy now.
dialogue_jp:
ワールドレポートについて
なにか　質問はありますか？

dialogue_en: Have any questions?
dialogue_jp: なにか　お困りですか？

dialogue_en: Fixin' to fly?
dialogue_jp: ご利用どーも！

dialogue_en: You rang?
dialogue_jp: おう　呼んだか！

dialogue_en: Y'all need a lift?
dialogue_jp: オレの出番ってか？

dialogue_en: We are cleared for takeoff!
dialogue_jp: しっかり　つかまっとけ～！

dialogue_en: Hold on tight!
dialogue_jp: チビんじゃねえぞ！

dialogue_en: Prepare to be razzled and dazzled!
dialogue_jp: オレ様のテクニックにほれんなよ～？

dialogue_en: Have a good one!
dialogue_jp: 毎度あり～！

dialogue_en: Don't be a stranger now, y'hear?
dialogue_jp: 今後とも　ごひいきに～！

dialogue_en: 'Preciate the business!
dialogue_jp: んじゃ　あばよ～！

dialogue_en: This is your captain speakin'. Outside your windows, you'll see open waters.
dialogue_jp: 船長よりお知らせです　これより海です

dialogue_en: Be advised there may be sudden ocean swells. How was that?
dialogue_jp: 突然の高波に　ご注意くださいってか～？

dialogue_en: Ugh, just kill me now...
dialogue_jp: カンベンして～

dialogue_en: Achoo!
dialogue_jp: ヘクシュン……

dialogue_en: This thing's practically a paddleboat. Sea could swallow us whole on a whim.
dialogue_jp:
こいつは小型艇だ
大航海なんてのは無理だからな

dialogue_en: So we're stickin' to the shallows!
dialogue_jp: そこんとこ　ヨロシク！

dialogue_en: Visibility's shit this far north. Best turn around.
dialogue_jp: この先は視界が確保できねえ　引き返すぞ

dialogue_en: Fog ahead. Better steer clear.
dialogue_jp: 霧が出てやがんな　戻るか

dialogue_en: Don't like the look of that fog. Hard to starboard!
dialogue_jp: 前方に霧確認　面舵いっぱーい！

dialogue_en: I ain't dockin' in no Shinra port.
dialogue_jp: 神羅の港はやめとこうぜ

dialogue_en: Best avoid Junon for now.
dialogue_jp: ジュノン港はやべえな

dialogue_en: 'Fore Shinra lays eyes on us, I say we skedaddle.
dialogue_jp: 神羅に目ぇつけられる前に　退散退散！

dialogue_en: Hm-hmmm, hm-hmmm...♪
dialogue_jp: ふ～ん　ふ～ふふ～ん　ふふふ～んふふ～ん♪

dialogue_en:
Think it's about time we kicked it up a notch.
Full speed ahead and hold course!
dialogue_jp:
そろそろ飛ばしてくか
全速前進　ヨーソロー！

dialogue_en: No storm clouds, swells, or crosswinds. Not a thing!
dialogue_jp:
天気良し　風ナシ　波ナシ
なんにもなーし！

dialogue_en: Sailin' so smooth it's boring. Might take a nap.
dialogue_jp: コンチキショウ　このままだと眠っちまうぞ

dialogue_en: Wouldn't mind some waves to mix it up a bit. Am I right?
dialogue_jp: 眠気覚ましに　嵐でもこねえかな～

dialogue_en: This is your captain speakin'. If you're feeling seasick, I suggest takin' a gander at the sky─get your imagination goin'.
dialogue_jp:
アーアー　船長からのお知らせです
船酔い中のお客様は　空を見上げてみてください

dialogue_en: Gaze up at that endless blue canvas, dotted with puffy white clouds. Then whoosh! The Tiny Bronco splits the scene in two!
dialogue_jp:
青い空　ゆっくりと漂う雲　照りつける太陽
そしてそこを切り裂いて飛ぶタイニーブロンコ

dialogue_en: Tumbles from a loop into a tailspin, but pulls up at the last second!
dialogue_jp: 宙返りに急降下　きりもみ回転からの急上昇

dialogue_en: Goddammit. Wish I was flyin' right now.
dialogue_jp: ああクソ　飛びたくなってきやがった！

dialogue_en: Sailin' ain't without its charm, but it doesn't hold a candle to ridin' the wind.
dialogue_jp:
船旅もいいけどよ
やっぱり　空がいちばんだよな～

dialogue_en: ...Woulda taken better care of her if I knew we'd end up playin' sailors.
dialogue_jp:
こんなことになるなら
もっとしっかり　整備しとくんだったぜ

dialogue_en: I don't care if they're two feet high or twenty─just give me some kinda waves. Anythin' to get this boat rockin'!
dialogue_jp:
さあさあ　大波小波なんでも来やがれってんだ
並みの波じゃあ　オレは驚かねえぞ～

dialogue_en: Screw it! Bring on a full-blown squall! We can take it!
dialogue_jp: よ～し上等だ　特上で来やがれ～！

dialogue_en: There ya are.
dialogue_jp: おっ　来たな！

dialogue_en: Need that radio.
dialogue_jp: 無線を使うぞ

dialogue_en: Thing's practically an antique.
dialogue_jp: 古いぞ　使えるか？

dialogue_en: Even better.
dialogue_jp: 好都合だ

dialogue_en: Still got some more repairs to make, but lemme know when y'all're ready to roll.
dialogue_jp:
オレは　相棒の整備だ
準備ができたら　声をかけてくれ

dialogue_en: You ready to jet?
dialogue_jp: おっ　出発か？

dialogue_en: Who among you is a worthy opponent?
dialogue_jp: ここで　いちばん強いヤツはどいつだ？

dialogue_en: I will show you the true spirit of Queen's Blood!
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドの神髄を
見せてやる

dialogue_en: Hmph. Is no one here brave enough to challenge me?
dialogue_jp: むう　誰も挑戦してこんな

dialogue_en:
I'm not interested in...amateurs.
Come back when you're worth beating.
dialogue_jp:
俺は強いヤツと戦いたいんだ
もっとランクをあげて　出直しな

dialogue_en: Someone of your rank isn't even fit to be crushed beneath my boot.
dialogue_jp:
いまのおまえのランクじゃ
俺の神髄は見せられんな

dialogue_en: Hah, finally! Someone who's worth a damn.
dialogue_jp: ふん　やっと骨のありそうなヤツがきたな

dialogue_en:
I'm Cameron, Queen's Blood champion.
And I roam the world in search of proper sport.
dialogue_jp:
俺は『さすらいのカマロ』
強者を求めて　世界を旅するバウターだ

dialogue_en: I've scaled mountains, braved wastelands...
dialogue_jp: 山を越え　川を渡り　草原をさすらい

dialogue_en:
As I communed with nature, I received a vision.
The true spirit of this game we both play.
dialogue_jp:
大自然と触れ合うなかで
俺はクイーンズ・ブラッドの神髄を見た

dialogue_en: And now, I shall reveal it to you.
dialogue_jp: それを　おまえに披露してやろう

dialogue_en: Are you prepared? Then come!
dialogue_jp: さあ　準備はいいか？

dialogue_en: What? Don't tell me you've lost your nerve?
dialogue_jp: なんだ　怖気づいたのか？

dialogue_en: Allow me to convey to you the true spirit of Queen's Blood.
dialogue_jp: クイーンズ・ブラッドの神髄を教えてやろう

dialogue_en: Show me what you're made of─your very spirit!
dialogue_jp: おまえの神髄を見せてくれないか

dialogue_en: Queen's Blood is more complex than I had ever imagined. I cannot thank you enough for this lesson.
dialogue_jp:
やはり　クイーンズ・ブラッドは奥深い
よい修行になった　感謝する

dialogue_en:
This is wrong...
This is all wrong!
dialogue_jp: どういうことだ　なにが起こっている？

dialogue_en:
I don't understand.
It was just supposed to be a game!
dialogue_jp: 私はただ　皆で遊べるものを作りたくて――

dialogue_en: No...
dialogue_jp: なんだ？

dialogue_en: There it is again... That voice.
dialogue_jp: まただ　いまの声……

dialogue_en: Could it be......has returned?
dialogue_jp: 本当に――なのか？

dialogue_en: No, that's impossible. It's just a silly card game!
dialogue_jp:
いや　ありえない
ただのカードゲームだったはずだ

dialogue_en: Aaah!
Oh god. What've I done!?
dialogue_jp: 馬鹿な　どうして

dialogue_en: I have to tell them. They all need to know the terrible truth about Queen's Blood.
dialogue_jp:
このままでは……
いますぐ　クイーンズ・ブラッドを――

dialogue_en: You okay?
dialogue_jp: どうした？

dialogue_en: Were you granted a transcendent vision─as I too was?
dialogue_jp:
カードバウトにのめり込みすぎるあまり
幻覚でも見たか

dialogue_en: You look as though you've just seen a ghost.
dialogue_jp: 亡霊でも見たような顔をしているぞ

dialogue_en: Saying that...I'm reminded of the story of Lidrehl Balmon, the creator of Queen's Blood.
dialogue_jp:
そういえば　クイーンズ・ブラッドの
生みの親である歴史学者のリドラルも

dialogue_en:
After he started selling cards,
he spoke of hearing a "strange voice."
dialogue_jp:
カードを発売してすぐに
『奇妙な声が聞こえる』と言っていたらしい

dialogue_en: He then withdrew from the public eye and became a recluse. No one saw him again until his death.
dialogue_jp:
そのあと　人前から姿を消し
自宅で孤独に死んだそうだ

dialogue_en: There's no shortage of people who've had their lives turned upside down by the cards. Just goes to show what a deep and captivating game it is.
dialogue_jp:
このゲームに人生を狂わされた者は少なくない
それほど　魅力的で奥深いというべきか

dialogue_en: Indeed. This match of ours stands as proof of that truth as well, I believe.
dialogue_jp:
おまえと戦って
新たな神髄を見つけることができた

dialogue_en: Thank you for this experience, my friend.
dialogue_jp: よい修行になった　感謝する

dialogue_en: Hahaha! That was the true spirit of Queen's Blood.
dialogue_jp: ふふふ　これがクイーンズ・ブラッドの神髄だ

dialogue_en: Don't take it too hard. I'm just that much better than you.
dialogue_jp: 気に病むな　俺が強すぎるだけだ

dialogue_en: You managed a draw against me! All your hard work must finally be paying off.
dialogue_jp:
俺と引き分けるとは
おまえも　かなり修業を積んできたようだな

dialogue_en: Ugh... Perhaps I ought to do some soul-searching.
dialogue_jp: もっとさすらって　神髄を見つけねば

dialogue_en: Grr... It seems I need to refine my technique.
dialogue_jp: ぐう　まだまだ修業が足りないようだ

dialogue_en: Begone, wickedness! Begone!
dialogue_jp: 邪念　退散！

dialogue_en: Hrrn... Hrah!
dialogue_jp: むうう　喝ッ！

dialogue_en: You require more training if you hope to face me.
dialogue_jp: わしと戦うには　鍛錬が足りんの

dialogue_en: Can't you see I'm meditating?
dialogue_jp: 瞑想中だ　邪魔するでない

dialogue_en: So, you have begun to fulfill your potential. Long have I awaited this day.
dialogue_jp:
おお　ようやく辿り着いたか
おぬしが来るのを待っておったぞ

dialogue_en: Hahah... At ease, young SOLDIER.
dialogue_jp: ほほほ　そう警戒せんでもよい

dialogue_en: I took your measure the moment you set foot in this town. Hard not to, given your presence.
dialogue_jp:
この小さな村に　おぬしは目立ちすぎる
どこにおっても感じ取れるわい

dialogue_en: I am Navalan of the thousand eyes. Years of meditation have granted me sight beyond sight.
dialogue_jp:
わしは『百目のナバラ』
瞑想により手に入れた　百の心眼

dialogue_en: It is this clarity which shows me all─even that which some wish to keep hidden.
dialogue_jp:
どれだけ隠れても無駄なこと
おぬしのことは　すべてお見通しよ

dialogue_en: You exude a powerful yet troubled aura... Indeed, it makes you the perfect opponent.
dialogue_jp:
その複雑で力強いオーラ
うむ　相手にとって不足なし！

dialogue_en: Come─and don't you dare hold anything back!
dialogue_jp: さあ　心して挑んでくるがよい

dialogue_en: Hahaha! Afraid I may expose the darkness within?
dialogue_jp: ほほほ　丸裸にされるのが怖いのかの？

dialogue_en: Oh? Undaunted by the clarity of my second sight?
dialogue_jp: どれ　わしの心眼で丸裸にしてやろう

dialogue_en: Then let me gaze into the depths of your soul.
dialogue_jp: おぬしの心を　のぞいてみようかの

dialogue_en: I sense a great evil festering within the cards of this game. Best keep at least one eye open.
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドに邪悪な気配が漂っている
気をつけたほうがいいぞ

dialogue_en: My name is Lidrehl Balmon...and I am the creator of the game Queen's Blood.
dialogue_jp:
私の名前は　リドラル・バモン
クイーンズ・ブラッドの生みの親だ

dialogue_en:
Which means that...
this nightmare is of my own making.
dialogue_jp: つまり　すべては私の責任だ

dialogue_en: I didn't know. How could I?
dialogue_jp: まさか　こんなことになるとは

dialogue_en: You hear her too? Time's running out.
dialogue_jp: 聞こえたか？　もう時間がない

dialogue_en: She's calling me... Commanding me...
dialogue_jp: 彼女が呼んでいる　行かなければ

dialogue_en: She's made me her prisoner.
dialogue_jp: 私は　囚われている

dialogue_en: Her accursed card my shackle. The end is nigh.
dialogue_jp: 呪いのカードだ　終わりは近い

dialogue_en: Or perhaps...this is only the beginning.
dialogue_jp: いや　これは始まりなのか？

dialogue_en: The Shadowblood Queen is...
dialogue_jp: 『黒紅の女王』が――

dialogue_en:
Let me guess.
You have dreamt the dream of Lidrehl Balmon too.
dialogue_jp:
もしや　おぬし
リドラルの幻覚を目にしたのか？

dialogue_en: Whadda you know about it?
dialogue_jp: なにか　知っているのか？

dialogue_en: Only rumors and hearsay: that players of particular skill have experienced strange visions of late.
dialogue_jp:
最近　バウターたちの間で
奇妙な白昼夢を見たという噂が広がっておる

dialogue_en: Visions in which one is visited by the ghost of the game's creator, who speaks of portentous events.
dialogue_jp:
なんでも　クイーンズ・ブラッドを生み出した
リドラルの亡霊が話しかけてくるとか

dialogue_en: To add another wrinkle...
dialogue_jp: それだけでないぞ

dialogue_en: some of the world's very best have recently met with unnaturally violent deaths.
dialogue_jp:
すこしまえから　名だたるバウターたちが
次々と変死しておってな

dialogue_en: People are calling this the Curse of Lidrehl.
dialogue_jp: リドラルの呪いだという者もおる

dialogue_en: Not even my third eye can discern the true cause, though it is clearly something sinister.
dialogue_jp:
わしの心眼をもってしても見極められぬ
邪悪ななにかが動き始めておる

dialogue_en: If you wish to continue on the path of the cards, then remain vigilant, or it may lead to your undoing.
dialogue_jp:
おぬし　このまま最強のバウターを目指すなら
くれぐれも注意することだ

dialogue_en: To see the world as it truly is, rely not on your eyes, but your heart.
dialogue_jp:
目に見えるものにとらわれてはいかん
心の目で見るのだ

dialogue_en: Your second sight could still use some work.
dialogue_jp: もっと　心眼を鍛えることだな

dialogue_en: Managing a tie against me is no small feat.
dialogue_jp: わしと引き分けるとは　たいしたものだ

dialogue_en: I see you're continuing to improve.
dialogue_jp: おぬし　また腕を上げたな

dialogue_en: It seems I have been well and truly bested.
dialogue_jp: わしが　丸裸にされてしまったな

dialogue_en: Algorithm generation complete.
dialogue_jp: アルゴリズム　構築完了

dialogue_en: Assessing queentessence...
dialogue_jp: バウト力を計測中

dialogue_en: Running diagnostics... Cooling fans severely damaged by airborne sand particles.
dialogue_jp:
砂により　排熱ファンに深刻なダメージ
メンテナンスを希望シマス

dialogue_en: I have undergone a version upgrade. Your queentessence level is no match for mine.
dialogue_jp:
ワイズは　バージョンアップしました
いまのあなたでは勝負にナリマセン

dialogue_en: Improve your performance to challenge me.
dialogue_jp: もっと　ランクをあげてきてクダサイ

dialogue_en:
Insufficient queentessence.
A higher rank is required to challenge me.
dialogue_jp:
バウト力が足リマセン
もっと　ランクをあげてきてクダサイ

dialogue_en: Hello, Cloud. We meet again.
dialogue_jp: お久しぶりデス　クラウド様

dialogue_en: Since we fought, I have used the experiences accumulated aboard the Shinra-8 to conduct a version upgrade.
dialogue_jp:
ワイズは連絡船でのバウトを経テ
見事　バージョンアップに成功シマシタ

dialogue_en: You may now refer to me as Wize 3.0 Version 2.0.
dialogue_jp:
名づけて
『ワイズ Type III Ver.2.0』デス！

dialogue_en: Analyzing... Your queentessence indicates that you may pose a challenge.
dialogue_jp:
ムムム……
あなた　ナカナカのバウト力をお持ちデスネ

dialogue_en: Greetings. I am Wize 3.0 Version 2.0.
dialogue_jp: ワタクシは『ワイズ Type III Ver.2.0』

dialogue_en: The world's preeminent AI Queen's Blood player.
dialogue_jp: 最強のカードバウトロボット　デス！

dialogue_en: I was hoping to assess my current capabilities after my recent update.
dialogue_jp:
ちょうど　バージョンアップ後の
テストをしたいと　思ってイマシタ

dialogue_en: An opponent of your skill level should be sufficient for this test.
dialogue_jp: あなたのバウト力なら　問題ないデショウ

dialogue_en: May the best man─or AI─claim victory!
dialogue_jp: では　ジンジョーに勝負デス！

dialogue_en: That is unfortunate. Perhaps another time, then?
dialogue_jp: 残念デス　では　マタの機会に

dialogue_en: Engage QB protocol?
dialogue_jp: カードバウトしますか？

dialogue_en: Please allow me to assess your queentessence.
dialogue_jp: バウト力を　測定させてクダサイ

dialogue_en: Why did I open the door?
dialogue_jp: 手を出すべきではなかったんだ

dialogue_en:
I should have heeded the stories─the warnings.
It is an─
dialogue_jp: ただの伝承ではなかった　あれは災――だ

dialogue_en: ...I...can't stop shaking.
dialogue_jp: 震えが　止まらない

dialogue_en: I have to destroy this card.
dialogue_jp: このカードを捨てなければ

dialogue_en: I know that. But still I...
dialogue_jp: わかっているのに　どうしても……

dialogue_en: It's too late now. She will not be denied.
dialogue_jp: なにもかもが　遅すぎたんだ

dialogue_en: Malfunction! Malfunction!
dialogue_jp: エラー発生　エラー発生

dialogue_en: Abnormal levels detected.
dialogue_jp: 異常なバウト力を検知

dialogue_en: Running search... Complete.
dialogue_jp: 検索の結果　当該データを

dialogue_en: Levels confirmed to be a match for Queen's Blood creator Lidrehl Balmon.
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドの制作者
リドラル・バモン氏のものと断定

dialogue_en: Conducting follow-up search...
dialogue_jp: さらに　検索を続行――

dialogue_en: Two hits: Mr. Balmon's obituary and a voice recording by the reporter who discovered the body.
dialogue_jp:
リドラル氏の死亡記事　および
遺体を発見した記者によるボイスメモを発見

dialogue_en: Preparing voice recording...
dialogue_jp: ボイスメモを再生します

dialogue_en: I'm currently standing outside the home of Lidrehl Balmon─the famed creator of Queen's Blood.
dialogue_jp:
私はいま　クイーンズ・ブラッドの生みの親である
リドラル・バモン氏の家の前にいます

dialogue_en: Now, let's hope he's willing to answer a few questions for us.
dialogue_jp: これより　突撃取材を敢行したいと思います

dialogue_en: What's this smell? It's awful!
dialogue_jp: なんだ　このニオイ……ひどいニオイだ

dialogue_en: Mr. Balmon? Are you home?
dialogue_jp: リドラルさん　いらっしゃいますか？

dialogue_en: Oh my god. I can't believe it... Mr. Balmon is dead!
dialogue_jp:
大変なことになりました
リドラル氏が　死んでいます！

dialogue_en: How long has he been in here!?
dialogue_jp: 死後どれぐらいでしょうか

dialogue_en: It must've been ages! His body is...
dialogue_jp: 腐敗の状況から　かなり経過しているようです

dialogue_en: The results of the autopsy revealed the cause of death to be starvation.
dialogue_jp: 後日　解剖の結果　死因は餓死と判明

dialogue_en: The state in which he was found suggests that he had been playing Queen's Blood without stopping to eat, drink, or sleep.
dialogue_jp:
現場の状況から　リドラル氏は飲まず食わずで
クイーンズ・ブラッドをやっていた模様

dialogue_en: I've found numerous cards scattered on the floor around him, and... Hold on. What's this?
dialogue_jp:
遺体のそばには無数のカードが散らばっており……
って　おいおい待てよ

dialogue_en: That card... It looks like...the Shadowblood─
dialogue_jp: あのカードって　まさか黒紅の――

dialogue_en: The recording breaks up after that.
dialogue_jp: ボイスメモは　ここで途切れています

dialogue_en: As it so happens, Mr. Balmon was in possession of the world's one and only Shadowblood Queen card.
dialogue_jp:
リドラル氏は　世界で１枚しかないカード
『黒紅の女王』を所有していましたが

dialogue_en: However, the card was not found in his home, leading to theories that the reporter who discovered the body stole it.
dialogue_jp:
遺品からは見つからず　第一発見者の記者が
持ち去ったものと考えられています

dialogue_en: The reporter in question subsequently went missing, a─
dialogue_jp: 以降　その記者は行方不明に――

dialogue_en: Unexpected shutdown occurred.
dialogue_jp: 予期せぬシャットダウンを確認

dialogue_en: System rebooting... Do not shut off power.
dialogue_jp:
再起動中……
しばらく　お待ちクダサイ

dialogue_en: What was I doing?
dialogue_jp: ワタクシは　なにヲ？

dialogue_en: Memory restored.
dialogue_jp: ああ　ソウデシタ

dialogue_en: Yeah...
dialogue_jp: ああ……

dialogue_en: I had just registered a loss against you in a game of Queen's Blood.
dialogue_jp:
カードバウトで　クラウド様に
負けてしまったのデスネ

dialogue_en: Version update required to secure path to world domination.
dialogue_jp:
次こそは勝てるヨウ
さらに　バージョンアップしておきます

dialogue_en: Thank you very much for playing with me.
dialogue_jp: 対戦　ありがとうゴザイマシタ

dialogue_en: I am victorious. Upgrade has improved queentessence to a sufficient degree.
dialogue_jp:
ワタクシの勝ちデスネ
これが　バージョンアップのチカラです

dialogue_en: Ha ha ha. Perhaps you should consider performing an update on yourself as well.
dialogue_jp:
フフフ　クラウド様も
バージョンアップされてミマスカ？

dialogue_en: Tie registered. Well played, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: 引き分けデスカ　ヤリマスネ

dialogue_en: I see... Further upgrades may be required.
dialogue_jp: ムムム　もっとバージョンアップしないと

dialogue_en:
Your queentessence is vastly superior.
What is your version number?
dialogue_jp:
さすがデス
クラウド様のバージョンは　いくつデスカ？

dialogue_en: What is this voice I'm hearing?
dialogue_jp: この声は　なに？

dialogue_en: The queen?
dialogue_jp: 女王……？

dialogue_en: What's going on?
dialogue_jp: どういうこと？

dialogue_en: Playing me'd be a waste of both my time and yours.
dialogue_jp: いまのあなたのランクじゃ　戦う気になれないわ

dialogue_en: If you wanna go a round with me, then you'll have to earn it.
dialogue_jp:
わたしとバウトしたいなら
もっと　ランクをあげてきて

dialogue_en:
We've met before, haven't we?
Hold on. Your name's...Cloud, right?
dialogue_jp:
どこかで見た顔ね
たしか　クラウドだっけ

dialogue_en: What d'you want?
dialogue_jp: なにか用？

dialogue_en:
Cloud. Fancy seeing you again.
What're you doing here?
dialogue_jp:
なんだ　クラウドか
こんなところで　どうしたの？

dialogue_en: No, don't tell me. Are you here for a match?
dialogue_jp: もしかして　わたしとバウトしたいの？

dialogue_en: I'm game, I guess...
dialogue_jp: べつにいいけど

dialogue_en: ...Well, come on. We doin' this or what?
dialogue_jp: やるなら　さっさと済ませましょう

dialogue_en: You sure? That's fine by me.
dialogue_jp: そう　それならそれでいいわ

dialogue_en: You're not here to play, are you?
dialogue_jp: なに　勝負するの？

dialogue_en: Fine... Let's get this over with.
dialogue_jp: バウトなら　さっさと済ませましょう

dialogue_en: Come. Let me tell you a story.
dialogue_jp: すこし　昔話をしようか

dialogue_en:
Once, there lived a queen of
peerless beauty and compassion.
dialogue_jp: かつて　美しく心優しい女王がいた

dialogue_en: She loved her people, and they in turn loved her.
dialogue_jp: 女王は民に愛され　女王も民を愛していた

dialogue_en:
But one day, a change came over the queen.
In the blink of an eye, her love turned to hate─her compassion to cruelty.
dialogue_jp:
しかし　突然ある日を境に
女王は冷酷で残忍な性格に変わってしまう

dialogue_en:
Fair and beauteous though she remained,
her heart became black as pitch.
dialogue_jp:
まるで　姿や声はそのままに
中身だけを入れ替えたかのように

dialogue_en: Conquest was now her cause, her subjects mere fodder to feed her boundless ambition.
dialogue_jp:
それ以降　女王は民の命を使い
侵略を始める

dialogue_en: And so her kingdom grew as her people perished.
dialogue_jp: 領土が広がるにつれ　民は死んでいった

dialogue_en:
Until, that is, a ray of hope appeared─
a sorceress who would be their salvation.
dialogue_jp:
ある日　苦しむ民のまえに
ひとりの魔女が現れた

dialogue_en: The Emerald Witch they called her. And with her arcane powers, she led the people in rebellion, captured the queen, and put her to death.
dialogue_jp:
その魔女は翠玉色の不思議な力を操り
民たちを先導し　女王を捕らえ　処刑した

dialogue_en: Yet from the tyrant's body spilled blood as dark as shadow. And from this wicked ichor, the myriad fiends of the world were born.
dialogue_jp:
その際　流れた黒紅色の血からモンスターが生まれ
そして世界中に広まったという

dialogue_en: And that...is the story of the Shadowblood Queen.
dialogue_jp: これが　『黒紅の女王』の物語だ

dialogue_en:
Some call it a parable. A myth. A fairy tale.
And I wish it were!
dialogue_jp: ただの昔話　伝承　言い伝え……のはずだった

dialogue_en: But she is as real as you and I!
dialogue_jp: しかし　彼女は実際にいた

dialogue_en: And she is coming. Her resurrection is nigh.
dialogue_jp: いや　これから生まれると言ったほうが正しいか

dialogue_en: You know what must be done.
dialogue_jp: もう　わかるだろ？

dialogue_en:
She cannot be allowed to return.
She must not reclaim her throne!
dialogue_jp: 黒紅の女王だ　彼女を蘇らせてはいけない

dialogue_en: I pray you will succeed...where I so miserably failed.
dialogue_jp:
私ではダメだった
あとは　君に託そう

dialogue_en: You are our last hope...Cloud.
dialogue_jp: そう……君だ　クラウド

dialogue_en: I await you at the Haunted Hotel. You must hurry.
dialogue_jp: ホーンテッドホテルで待つ　急いでくれ

dialogue_en: Don't mind me. Not been feeling so hot.
dialogue_jp: ごめんなさい　ちょっと調子が悪いの

dialogue_en: Hey, Cloud? Do you know anything about the Shadowblood Queen card?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　クラウド
『黒紅の女王』ってカード　知ってる？

dialogue_en: It's the most powerful card in the world. One of a kind. Though it seems there's a special card that can supposedly counter it.
dialogue_jp:
世界で１枚しかない最強のレアカードなんだけど
実は　それと対をなすカードが存在するの

dialogue_en: The Emerald Witch.
dialogue_jp: 『翠玉の魔女』っていう――

dialogue_en: Sorry, sorry. Just...forget I said anything.
dialogue_jp: ごめん　やっぱりいまのは忘れて

dialogue_en: I'm really tired is all. Too many competitions lately.
dialogue_jp:
わたし　疲れてるみたい
すこし休ませてもらうわ

dialogue_en: There. Happy now?
dialogue_jp: これで　気が済んだでしょ？

dialogue_en: Are we done yet? I don't have time for this.
dialogue_jp: もういいでしょ　考え事がしたいの

dialogue_en:
I'm really not feeling well.
Can you give me some space?
dialogue_jp: ちょっと調子が悪いの　休ませてちょうだい

dialogue_en: Where is he?
dialogue_jp: まだか……

dialogue_en: We cannot delay.
dialogue_jp: このままでは……

dialogue_en: There's no time.
dialogue_jp: 急がなければ

dialogue_en: I'm afraid you're not up to the challenge just yet. Go and train. I'll be here.
dialogue_jp:
いまの君ではダメだ
もっと　力をつけてきてくれ

dialogue_en: I'm glad you came, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: よくきた　クラウド

dialogue_en: I am Lidrehl Balmon...the person responsible for Queen's Blood.
dialogue_jp:
私が　クイーンズ・ブラッドの生みの親
リドラル・バモンだ

dialogue_en: The queen doesn't know what I'm up to yet─what I'm plotting─but we don't have long. Time is of the essence.
dialogue_jp:
いまは女王の目を盗んで
君に語りかけている　だがそう長くはもたない

dialogue_en: You must show me what you are capable of before she discovers us.
dialogue_jp: 女王に見つかるまえに　君の力を見せてくれ

dialogue_en: Time is running out.
dialogue_jp: 急いでくれよ

dialogue_en: I'm dying for a game.
dialogue_jp: またの挑戦をお待ちしています

dialogue_en: Prove that you have what it takes─that you can defeat me.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　君の力を見せてもらおう

dialogue_en: Welcome to the Haunted Hotel! I hope you have a spook-tacular stay. Care for a game?
dialogue_jp:
幽霊が住まう　ホーンテッドホテルへようこそ
死者とカードでも　いかがかな？

dialogue_en: Well played.
dialogue_jp: すばらしい

dialogue_en: Not that I ever truly doubted your potential. I was right to leave you that letter.
dialogue_jp:
さすが　私が見込んだバウターだ
手紙を送ったかいがある

dialogue_en: "Letter"? What letter?
dialogue_jp: 手紙？　なんのことだ

dialogue_en: You remember, don't you?
dialogue_jp: カームの宿だ

dialogue_en: The Inn at Kalm? I hung it on your door, though I signed it in the proprietor's name.
dialogue_jp:
あの時　宿の主の名をかたり
カードを送ったのは　私だ

dialogue_en: And that missive you received aboard the Shinra-8? Also my doing.
dialogue_jp: それと　連絡船の大会にもメッセージを送ったかな

dialogue_en: "To Cloud Strife, From a friendly specter."
dialogue_jp: 親愛なる亡霊から　クラウド・ストライフへ

dialogue_en: So that was you.
dialogue_jp: あんただったのか

dialogue_en: Forgive my subterfuge, but I was in dire need of a skilled player.
dialogue_jp: 許してくれ　有望なバウターが必要だったんだ

dialogue_en: And you certainly did not disappoint. You were even able to best me.
dialogue_jp:
期待どおり　君は強くなり
私のまえに現れた

dialogue_en: Which, while impressive, won't be enough.
dialogue_jp: だが　それでも足りない

dialogue_en: Not if you intend to hold the Shadowblood Queen's card in your deck.
dialogue_jp: 『黒紅の女王』の力は　こんなものではない

dialogue_en: That foul thing is the source of this nightmare. The very embodiment of the villain herself.
dialogue_jp:
すべての元凶は『黒紅の女王』のカードだ
あのカードは　意思を持っている

dialogue_en: Through the card, she feeds on the wielder's life force, claiming their strength, that she may one day be reborn.
dialogue_jp:
カードを手に入れたバウターの精気を吸い取り
呪い殺しては　次のバウターへと移る

dialogue_en: Countless players have succumbed to this vile curse.
dialogue_jp: これまでに　多くのバウターが犠牲になった

dialogue_en: And now one more death is all she requires to return.
dialogue_jp: 次が最後だ　復活の時は近い

dialogue_en: Cloud... Find the sorceress.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　カードを手に入れろ

dialogue_en: She who rallied the people, she who deposed the queen─the Emerald Witch.
dialogue_jp:
民を先導し　女王を処刑した
『翠玉の魔女』のカードが必要だ

dialogue_en: Her card sleeps in Nibelheim, with a monster of chaos.
dialogue_jp:
魔女は　ニブルヘイムにいる
混沌の獣が持っている

dialogue_en: You must hurry, before it is too late...
dialogue_jp: 急いでくれ　女王が目を覚ますまえに……

dialogue_en: Her card sleeps in Nibelheim, with a monster of chaos.
dialogue_jp:
魔女は　ニブルヘイムにいる
混沌の獣が持っている

dialogue_en: And there it shall remain, until you can defeat her wielder, and prove yourself worthy of her power.
dialogue_jp:
しかし　いまの君では勝てない
まずはランクをあげるんだ　クラウド

dialogue_en: Hurry, Cloud. The queen must be stopped.
dialogue_jp: 頼むぞ　女王が目を覚ますまえに……

dialogue_en: Wrest her card from the monster of chaos.
dialogue_jp: 魔女は　混沌の獣が持っている

dialogue_en: But to do that, you must continue on your fateful journey. The pieces are not yet in place.
dialogue_jp:
しかし　いまはまだ戦いの時ではない
旅を続けるんだ　クラウド

dialogue_en: Do not delay, though. Her time is nigh...
dialogue_jp: 頼むぞ　女王が目を覚ますまえに……

dialogue_en: If you cannot even best me, then what hope do you have against the queen?
dialogue_jp:
私に勝てないようじゃ
女王には　絶対に勝てないぞ

dialogue_en: Hahaha... For a member of the living, your play was certainly lacking in spirit.
dialogue_jp:
ハッハッハ　幽霊に負けるとは
生きているのに　だらしがないですね

dialogue_en: It's not every day you get to play a ghost. Did you enjoy yourself?
dialogue_jp: 幽霊とのバウト　お楽しみいただけましたか？

dialogue_en: What incredible skill! Why, you nearly had me ready to give up the ghost all over again.
dialogue_jp:
すばらしい戦いっぷりでした
思わず　天に召されるところでしたよ

dialogue_en: Need something?
dialogue_jp: なにか用か？

dialogue_en: Of course. Should've known I wasn't the only one seeing ghosts.
dialogue_jp: なるほど　おまえも亡霊に導かれたようだな

dialogue_en: Shame, though... Some stories are better forgotten─including the queen's.
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッド……
また　やっかいな物語を掘り起こしたものだ

dialogue_en:
Know about the witch's card?
I heard you might have it.
dialogue_jp: 魔女のカードは　あんたが持っているのか？

dialogue_en: The Emerald Witch?
dialogue_jp: 『翠玉の魔女』か

dialogue_en: As luck would have it, the card does happen to be in my possession.
dialogue_jp: たしかに　なんの因果か私の手元にある

dialogue_en:
But it could be yours,
should you prove yourself worthy.
dialogue_jp:
おまえが魔女を持つに相応しいか
見極めるとしよう

dialogue_en: No shame in a tactical retreat. It's a better strategy than charging ahead recklessly.
dialogue_jp:
恥じることはない
敵前逃亡も　作戦のひとつだ

dialogue_en: Then let us see if you're worthy of becoming the witch's new keeper.
dialogue_jp:
おまえが魔女を持つに相応しいか
見極めるとしよう

dialogue_en: A duel it is.
dialogue_jp: 相手になろう

dialogue_en: It seems a transfer of ownership was in the cards after all.
dialogue_jp:
女王と魔女をめぐる運命は
おまえを選んだようだ

dialogue_en: Be warned: that which appears a mere pastime is shrouded in darkness.
dialogue_jp:
狂乱の遊戯によって広められた闇は
想像以上に深い

dialogue_en:
I suggest you proceed with caution,
lest it consume you too.
dialogue_jp:
侮ると　引きずりこまれるぞ
くれぐれも気をつけろ

dialogue_en: The situation is graver than I feared.
dialogue_jp: 事態は　思っていたよりも深刻なようだ

dialogue_en: Here. She'll guide you to the queen.
dialogue_jp: 魔女のカードが　女王まで導いてくれる

dialogue_en: The rest is in your hands.
dialogue_jp: あとはまかせた　クラウド

dialogue_en: That card remains with me until you can prove you're worthy.
dialogue_jp: 私に勝てないようでは　魔女は渡せないな

dialogue_en: Diverting, if nothing else.
dialogue_jp: 暇つぶしにはなったな

dialogue_en: I'd hoped for a better match than that.
dialogue_jp: すこし期待しすぎていたようだ

dialogue_en: Nicely done. I take this to mean you've been practicing?
dialogue_jp: 隙がないな　よくぞそこまで練り上げた

dialogue_en: You've a well-balanced deck, I see. Color me impressed.
dialogue_jp: いいデッキだ　かなりやりこんでいるようだな

dialogue_en: Oh, Cloud. It's you. Didn't think you'd come.
dialogue_jp: そっか　クラウド　あなたが来たのね

dialogue_en: You mind? Would prefer to have this conversation in private.
dialogue_jp: ねえ　ふたりきりにしてくれない？

dialogue_en: Here it is. The source of everything.
dialogue_jp: このカードが　すべての始まり

dialogue_en: All I ever wanted was to be worth something.
dialogue_jp: わたしね　強くなりたかったの

dialogue_en:
Queen's Blood gave me that.
Got people to respect me. Fear me.
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドさえ強ければ
見下されなかったから　馬鹿にされなかったから

dialogue_en:
Until...I started fearing for myself.
For what I might become.
dialogue_jp:
でもね　強くなれば強くなるほど
怖くなってきたの

dialogue_en: 'Cause I can't keep winning forever, and once I start losing, I'll be worthless.
dialogue_jp:
いつか　勝てなくなって
だれにも見向きもされなくなって

dialogue_en: Worse─a nobody!
dialogue_jp: ぜんぶ　失ってしまうんじゃないかって

dialogue_en: When I found her, I knew that I would never lose again, that I had been chosen for something greater─that I was blessed!
dialogue_jp:
だからね　偶然このカードを手に入れた時
わたし　神様がくれた贈り物だと思ったの

dialogue_en: But this... This isn't that at all...
dialogue_jp: でも　そうじゃなかった

dialogue_en: It's been speaking to me.
dialogue_jp: カードの声が聞こえる

dialogue_en: Telling me to give myself to her power─to dominate.
dialogue_jp: 『力に身を委ねろ　すべてを支配しろ』って

dialogue_en: I've tried not to for so long but...I...I can't...
dialogue_jp: 頑張って耐えてきたけど　もう　ダメみたい

dialogue_en: Regina?
dialogue_jp: レジー？

dialogue_en: Ah, yes.
dialogue_jp: 懐かしいな

dialogue_en: I remember well this land, for it was once mine.
dialogue_jp:
かつて　このあたりは
わらわのものだった

dialogue_en: Until that witch rallied the unwashed and put me to the sword.
dialogue_jp: 忌まわしき魔女と愚民どもに　殺されるまではな

dialogue_en: Well, little puppet. What do you say?
dialogue_jp: 勝負だ　傀儡の者よ

dialogue_en: A match against your queen.
dialogue_jp: わらわは　黒紅の女王

dialogue_en: For you, human, have a blood debt to pay in full.
dialogue_jp: 血の恨みは　血であがなってもらうぞ

dialogue_en: Frightened, are we? You should be.
dialogue_jp: なんだ　怖気づいたのか？

dialogue_en: Stake your life if you seek my death.
dialogue_jp: 血の代償は　高くつくぞ

dialogue_en: Are you prepared to die, little puppet?
dialogue_jp: 準備はよいか　傀儡の者よ

dialogue_en: Stake your life if you seek my death.
dialogue_jp: 血の代償は　高くつくぞ

dialogue_en: Are you prepared to die, little puppet?
dialogue_jp: 準備はよいか　傀儡の者よ

dialogue_en: Pathetic.
dialogue_jp: つまらんな

dialogue_en:
I will give you one more chance.
If you value your life, entertain me.
dialogue_jp:
もういちどだけ　チャンスをやろう
死ぬ気でわらわを楽しませろ

dialogue_en: We will play until I have grown accustomed to this new body. Do try to make it interesting, won't you?
dialogue_jp:
この体に慣れるまで　おまえと遊んでやる
せいぜい　楽しませろ

dialogue_en: Oh, hey, Cloud! Up for a match, by any chance?
dialogue_jp:
あっ　クラウド
バウトしよ　バウト！

dialogue_en: What, you wanna play a round of Queen's Blood with me? I guess I could.
dialogue_jp:
なに　わたしとバウトしたいの？
しょうがないなあ

dialogue_en: Aw, don't tell me you're chickening out.
dialogue_jp: ええ～　逃げんの～？

dialogue_en: Ooh, what a rush! Winning is the best.
dialogue_jp: やっぱ勝つのは　最っ高に気持ちいいね！

dialogue_en: That's just how the cookie crumbles. We could always go another round, if you want?
dialogue_jp:
まあ　こんなもんね
悔しいなら　もう１戦する？

dialogue_en: A tie? You have got to be kidding me.
dialogue_jp: 引き分けなんて　納得できな～い！

dialogue_en:
Well, shit. But hey, at least it was fun.
Lemme know if you wanna go again, okay?
dialogue_jp:
くやしい～　けど楽しい！
また勝負しようね

dialogue_en: Hmm... Was it my deck? Or maybe my strategy? Better keep practicing.
dialogue_jp:
う～ん　デッキのバランスが悪いのかなあ
もっと勉強しないと

dialogue_en: Unnnhhh... I want to play, but...what if I lose?
dialogue_jp:
ううう　怖い……
でも　バウトしたい

dialogue_en: I should just go up and challenge someone. Yeah! No─wait, what if they're better than me?
dialogue_jp:
うう……自分から話しかけてみようかな
でも　負けたらどうしよう

dialogue_en: Maybe if I look pathetic enough some QB rookie'll take pity on me...
dialogue_jp:
ううう　弱いバウターが
話しかけてくれないかなあ

dialogue_en:
Eep! Wh-what do you want!?
Don't scare me like that!
dialogue_jp:
うわ　ななな　なんですか
びっくりするじゃないですか！

dialogue_en: You...you don't wanna play Queen's Blood, do you? I was hoping that... Oh, what am I thinking? You look like you'd murder me.
dialogue_jp:
もしかしてクイーンズ・ブラッドですか？
ええ……やだなあ　見るからに強そうだもんな～

dialogue_en: Oh god, this is too much. I think I'm gonna throw up.
dialogue_jp: ううう……怖いよう

dialogue_en: Don't give me that look! It's perfectly healthy for adults to cry too, y'know!
dialogue_jp:
ああ　その顔
いきなり大人が泣き始めて　呆れていますね

dialogue_en: People call me Crybaby Ned...
dialogue_jp: ううう……僕は『泣き虫のシェド』

dialogue_en: Because the more tears I shed, the better I get at Queen's Blood! Please play a round with me!
dialogue_jp:
泣けば泣くほど　強くなるんです！
ううう……対戦よろしくお願いします～

dialogue_en: ...I get it. No one wants to play with a crybaby.
dialogue_jp:
ううう……
泣き虫の相手はしたくないんですね

dialogue_en: Eep! Oh no, you're back! I don't wanna lose...but I do wanna play.
dialogue_jp:
ううう……また来たんですね
怖いよう　でも負けたくないよ～

dialogue_en: Would you go a round with me?
dialogue_jp: ばばば　バウトするんですか？

dialogue_en:
Oh god, I lost! But...I feel a lot better
after having a good cry.
dialogue_jp:
あちゃ～　負けちゃったか～
でも　たくさん泣いてスッキリしました！

dialogue_en:
There's nothing like a game of
Queen's Blood to relieve some stress.
dialogue_jp:
やっぱり　ストレス解消には
カードバウトがいちばんですね

dialogue_en:
Speaking of... You look like you've
got a lot weighing you down too.
dialogue_jp:
おやおや～
あなたも　相当なストレスを溜め込んでますね

dialogue_en:
It's written all over your face.
Trust me: crying does wonders.
dialogue_jp:
顔を見ればわかります
大泣きバウト　オススメですよ～

dialogue_en: You really oughta try it!
dialogue_jp: ぜひ　やってみてください！

dialogue_en: Never underestimate a crybaby...
dialogue_jp: これが　泣き虫の力です～

dialogue_en: Even crybabies can fight back...
dialogue_jp: 泣き虫だって　噛みつくんですよ……

dialogue_en: That didn't make me feel better at all...
dialogue_jp: ううう　スッキリしない結果だよ～

dialogue_en: Whew... That was so refreshing!
dialogue_jp: いや～　清々しいほどに負けました！

dialogue_en: Losing always makes me feel much better.
dialogue_jp: 負けると　気分が晴れるんですよね～

dialogue_en: A little birdie told me you can't get enough of that card game, Queen's Blood.
dialogue_jp:
お嬢ちゃんはホント
クイーンズ・ブラッドが好きだねえ

dialogue_en: Yeah... It's true.
dialogue_jp: うん……好き

dialogue_en: Alright. How's about we give these two-bit chumps a whoopin'!?
dialogue_jp:
さあ　次はどのスットコドッコイと
バウトするかな

dialogue_en: Looks like you got yourself some new cards. So, you figured out what to do with 'em?
dialogue_jp:
新しく仕入れたカードはどうだい？
しっかり使いこなせているかい

dialogue_en: No... Not yet.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　むずかしい

dialogue_en: Well, ya ain't gonna learn nothin' unless ya try 'em out!
dialogue_jp: ビビらず　どんどん使って慣れるこった

dialogue_en:
Ooh, lookie here!
I'd say we got ourselves a contender!
dialogue_jp: お～っと　新しい挑戦者が来やがったぜ！

dialogue_en:
So how 'bout it, pretty boy?
You wanna throw down?
dialogue_jp:
ヘイ　兄ちゃん
いっちょ　バウトしていくか？

dialogue_en:
But first, lemme introduce you to
Nene, master ventriloquist.
dialogue_jp:
このお嬢ちゃんは
『腹話術師のネネ』っていうんだ

dialogue_en:
Now, she ain't much of a talker, but give her a deck of cards, and she'll wipe the floor with ya so fast,
it'll make your head spin!
dialogue_jp:
ちょっとシャイだが　ここぞという時は大爆発する
絶賛成長中のバウターさ！

dialogue_en:
Ready to get your ass handed to ya?
Well, are ya?
dialogue_jp: ナメてかかると　痛い目をみるぜ？

dialogue_en: Aw, what's the matter? Ya scared?
dialogue_jp: なんだ　ビビってんのか？

dialogue_en: Just so you know, Nene and her cards are ready for a game...if you got the guts.
dialogue_jp:
おっ　いいところに来たな
お嬢ちゃんの相手になってやってくんねえか？

dialogue_en: Pretty boy couldn't stay away, I see. If you're here to get your ass kicked, then step right up!
dialogue_jp:
よう兄ちゃん　ヒマしてんなら
お嬢ちゃんとバウトしていってくれよ

dialogue_en:
Whew, this guy packs one hell of a punch!
But hey, ya can't win 'em all!
dialogue_jp:
あちゃ～　負けちまったな
まあ　そんな時もあるさ

dialogue_en: Besides, what really matters is you were brave enough to take on a bona fide card shark like pretty boy here.
dialogue_jp:
お嬢ちゃんは　強えヤツに挑んだ
そのチャレンジ精神を忘れちゃいけねえ

dialogue_en: Sometimes, ya gotta take the L if you're serious about uppin' your game.
dialogue_jp: 負けを恐れてちゃあ　強くなれねえからな

dialogue_en:
Listen, kid, ya got what it takes to be a champ.
I'd bet my bottom gil on it!
dialogue_jp: お嬢ちゃんの爆発　しっかりと見届けたぜ

dialogue_en: Now why don'tcha show blondie your appreciation for bein' such a good sport?
dialogue_jp:
さあ　いっしょに遊んでくれた兄ちゃんに
お礼を言いな！

dialogue_en: Thank you for playing cards with me, mister.
dialogue_jp: 対戦　ありがとうございました

dialogue_en: Pow! How do ya like them apples? She might be small, but she's got power where it counts!
dialogue_jp:
どうだ　見たか！
うちのお嬢ちゃん　キレキレだったろ

dialogue_en:
Didja see that? Oughta be grateful, pal.
Ya just got schooled by a future champ!
dialogue_jp:
ハッハー　どんなもんよ
これがうちのお嬢ちゃんの爆発力よ！

dialogue_en: Hey, not bad. Ya gotta be a top-level player to even draw against Nene, y'know.
dialogue_jp:
うちのお嬢ちゃん相手に引き分けるたあ
なかなか　やるじゃねえか！

dialogue_en:
Thank you, I learned a lot.
Come back again, please.
dialogue_jp:
すごく勉強になりました
また遊んでください

dialogue_en:
You're a really great player...
Thanks again, mister.
dialogue_jp: いっしょに遊んでくれて　ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: ...What a glorious wall, keeping us safe and secure. I could gaze at it all day.
dialogue_jp:
フフフ　なんて美しい壁
壁に囲まれていると安心するわ

dialogue_en: Oh, I only hope I can someday become as strong as our bailey here.
dialogue_jp:
そそりたつ壁のように
私も　強くなりたいものね

dialogue_en: The players here are so frail in comparison to this majestic wall.
dialogue_jp:
カームの壁に比べて
なんともろいバウターばかりか

dialogue_en:
Excuse me.
That was my barricade you just destroyed.
dialogue_jp: 私の壁を壊して入ってくるなんて　失礼な人ね

dialogue_en:
Oh, come to admire the bailey?
It is something.
dialogue_jp: なに　あなたもカームの壁を鑑賞しにきたの？

dialogue_en:
Or maybe...you're here to get your
ass handed to you in a QB match?
dialogue_jp:
それとも　私とクイーンズ・ブラッドが
やりたいのかしら

dialogue_en: I'm Zahira. A pleasure.
dialogue_jp: 私は『鉄壁のジーヴル』

dialogue_en: Just like Kalm's wall, I yield to no one─refusing to give a single inch to my opponents.
dialogue_jp:
カームの壁のように　何事にも動じず
凛々しく　美しく守り切るカードバウター

dialogue_en:
Don't presume you'll emerge unscathed
if you decide to go up against me.
dialogue_jp:
私という壁にぶつかって
ただで済んだ者はいないわ

dialogue_en:
Because you will wind up
with more than just a few bruises.
dialogue_jp: 生半可な気持ちで挑戦するなら　やめておきなさい

dialogue_en: Challenging me would've been like banging your head against the wall.
dialogue_jp: 壁は逃げないわ　またいつでもどうぞ

dialogue_en: Well, don't say I didn't warn you.
dialogue_jp: カームの壁を見て　勉強してきた？

dialogue_en:
I'm skilled not only in defense,
but in offensive strategies as well.
dialogue_jp: 守りだけじゃなく　攻めを覚えた私は強いわよ

dialogue_en: Impossible. How could someone break through my perfect defense? Who are you?
dialogue_jp:
そんな……難攻不落の守りが崩されるなんて
あなた何者？

dialogue_en:
...Deep down, I always knew. I knew I
couldn't stay holed up in here forever.
dialogue_jp:
うすうす感じていたの
壁の中で閉じこもっているだけではダメだって

dialogue_en:
Walls can keep people safe, but even
the sturdiest ones eventually crumble.
dialogue_jp:
壁は優しく守ってくれるけど
いつかは乗り越えないといけないのよね

dialogue_en:
Right. Starting today, you will be
my new "wall," as it were.
dialogue_jp:
うん　決めた
今日からは　あなたが私の壁よ！

dialogue_en: And I am going to enjoy watching you crumble.
dialogue_jp: 必ず越えてみせるから　覚悟してなさい

dialogue_en: Guess I was too formidable for you.
dialogue_jp: 壁が高すぎたようね

dialogue_en: Perhaps you should shore up your own defenses.
dialogue_jp: 壁に守り方を教えてもらいなさい

dialogue_en: Well, it seems we're both equally unassailable.
dialogue_jp: まさに双璧　やるじゃないの

dialogue_en: No matter the obstacle, I will surmount it.
dialogue_jp: 障壁は高ければ高いほど燃えるわ

dialogue_en: Well played. I always learn something new from you.
dialogue_jp: さすがね　ますます挑みがいがあるわ

dialogue_en: Hey, look. I bet we could beat him!
dialogue_jp:
兄ちゃん
あの人なら勝てるんじゃない？

dialogue_en: Yeah, probably. But I don't get the feeling he's got any money.
dialogue_jp:
勝てるかもしんないけど
金は持ってなさそうだな

dialogue_en: Remember: we're not just looking for rookies; we're looking for rich rookies.
dialogue_jp:
いいか　バウトが弱そうで
金を持ってそうなヤツを探すんだ

dialogue_en: Uh-huh! Then we can make 'em pay up when we win!
dialogue_jp:
バウトに勝って
お駄賃をもらうんだよね！

dialogue_en: Oh, hey there, mister! Are you looking for someone to play Queen's Blood with?
dialogue_jp:
お兄さん　もしかして
バウトする相手を探してる？

dialogue_en: We'd be more than happy to go a round or two with you!
dialogue_jp: だったら　おれたちが相手しようか

dialogue_en: I'm Devin, the younger brother.
dialogue_jp: ぼくは　弟のデ・ムーア

dialogue_en: And I'm Darren, the older one.
dialogue_jp: おれは　兄のダ・ムーア

dialogue_en:
And together, we're the Double D Duo!
A team of twins who love Queen's Blood!
dialogue_jp:
ふたりあわせて『ツインズのムーア』！
双子のカードバウターだよ

dialogue_en:
You'll face my little brother here first.
If you win, then I'll take you on.
dialogue_jp:
まずは弟と戦って
勝てたら　おれと勝負できるよ

dialogue_en: Two for the price of one! Sweet deal, right?
dialogue_jp: いちどで２戦できて　すっごくお得なんだ

dialogue_en: Speaking of prices, if you lose against either of us, you gotta fork over three gil!
dialogue_jp:
その代わり　ぼくたちのどちらかに負けたら
３ギルもらうからね！

dialogue_en: We're ready to play whenever you are!
dialogue_jp: いつでも　挑戦しにきてね！

dialogue_en: Sorry, but no gil, no game.
dialogue_jp: お兄さん　お金が足りないよ

dialogue_en:
You wanna play?
Remember: if you lose, you owe us three gil.
dialogue_jp:
あっ　バウトします？
負けたら　３ギルですからね

dialogue_en: If you lose, you gotta give us three gil, okay?
dialogue_jp: 負けたら３ギルもらうからね　いい？

dialogue_en: Not bad! But next, you gotta beat me.
dialogue_jp:
やるじゃん
つぎは　おれが相手だよ

dialogue_en: Don't worry, Devin! I promise I'll avenge you!
dialogue_jp: 弟のカタキは　おれがうつ！

dialogue_en:
Aw, I can't believe we lost!
You're better at this than I thought.
dialogue_jp:
いや～　負けた負けた
お兄さん　強いね

dialogue_en:
Hold up...
Does this mean we don't get our three gil?
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　ぼくたち
３ギルもらえないの？

dialogue_en: No, he totally still owes us.
dialogue_jp: いや　どうだったかな～？

dialogue_en: I'm pretty sure the deal was if we lost, we got three gil. Isn't that right?
dialogue_jp:
おれたちが負けたら
３ギルもらえるって約束だったような～

dialogue_en: Uh, heheh... I'm just kidding.
dialogue_jp: あはは　冗談だって

dialogue_en: You may've beaten us this time, but we'll get that three gil from you yet!
dialogue_jp:
今回は負けちゃったけど
つぎこそ勝って　３ギルもらうから

dialogue_en: So if you're ever in the mood, come back and play!
dialogue_jp:
また　気が向いたら
おれたちとバウトしてよ

dialogue_en: Sweet! Thanks!
dialogue_jp: よっしゃあ　まいどあり！

dialogue_en: Okay! That's three gil for us!
dialogue_jp: は～い　３ギルいただきますね～

dialogue_en:
Ugh, how'd we get a tie?
Hey, maybe you could give us two gil instead?
dialogue_jp:
ちぇっ　引き分けか
お兄さん　２ギルでいいからくんない？

dialogue_en: Ugh, we lost again!?
dialogue_jp: くそ～　また負けた～

dialogue_en: Aren't grown-ups supposed to be nice and let kids win? C'mon!
dialogue_jp: お兄さん　大人なんだから手加減してよ

dialogue_en: Pretty sure I've snuffed out all the competition there is around here.
dialogue_jp:
この大陸のバウターたちは
あらかた倒したかな

dialogue_en: Guess I'd better get a move on, then. No point in stickin' around if there's no one left to fight.
dialogue_jp:
そろそろ旅立ちの時だね
この大陸はアタシには狭すぎる

dialogue_en: Aye, it's past time I set sail! The sea calls to me.
dialogue_jp:
海がアタシを呼んでいる
いまこそ　船をこぎだす時だ

dialogue_en: Hm? You're not lookin' to throw down, are ya? Sorry, but I was just about to leave port.
dialogue_jp:
対戦希望かい？
すまないが　これから海へ出るんだ

dialogue_en: Oh, name's Isabelle, by the way. Was lookin' for a challenge, but failed miserably.
dialogue_jp:
アタシは『船乗りのイザベラ』
強者を求めて　船をこぎだすところさ

dialogue_en: Since this place was a total bust, I figured I oughta try my luck elsewhere.
dialogue_jp:
この大陸のバウターは
どいつもこいつも　軟弱すぎるからね

dialogue_en: Although...maybe you can put up a decent fight.
dialogue_jp: でも　君はなかなか骨がありそうだ

dialogue_en: Whaddya say? One round of QB before I set sail?
dialogue_jp: 面白い　景気づけに１戦交えておこうか

dialogue_en: Better batten down the hatches, 'cause I don't hold back.
dialogue_jp: 沈まないよう　しっかり準備するんだね

dialogue_en: Gimme somethin' good, will ya?
dialogue_jp: ガッカリさせないでくれよ

dialogue_en: I'll take you on as many times as you want.
dialogue_jp: 君とのバウトなら　いつでも歓迎さ

dialogue_en: Damn, you are good. Took the wind right outta my sails. And here I was thinkin' my ship was unsinkable.
dialogue_jp:
そんな　このアタシが屈するなんて
これほどのバウターが　まだいたのか

dialogue_en: Happy to be proven wrong, though─especially by a real pro.
dialogue_jp:
どうやらアタシは
うぬぼれてしまっていたみたいだ

dialogue_en: Glad we could get that match in before I moved on.
dialogue_jp: 海に出るまえに　君と戦えてよかった

dialogue_en: With all that pent-up frustration, I wouldn't have been able to think or sail straight!
dialogue_jp:
このまま出航したところで
荒波にのまれて　沈むのがオチだったよ

dialogue_en: Thanks for clearing my head.
dialogue_jp: 気づかせてくれて　ありがとう

dialogue_en: I'm gonna stick around a bit longer─just enough to swab the deck once more.
dialogue_jp:
しばらくここに留まり
いまいちど　己の甲板を磨き直すよ

dialogue_en: I was right. This place is a bust.
dialogue_jp: この程度か　残念だな

dialogue_en: ...Guess I shouldna got my hopes up.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　すこし期待しすぎたみたいだね

dialogue_en: I don't get draws often. You are tougher than I thought.
dialogue_jp: 互角か　君を倒すのは骨が折れそうだ

dialogue_en: Of all the folks I've played, you're the only one who's made me feel like I've got room to grow.
dialogue_jp:
やはり　君とのバウトだけが
アタシに成長を感じさせてくれる

dialogue_en: Feels good to find someone who gives me a real run for my money.
dialogue_jp: 君だけだよ　アタシの期待に応えてくれるのは

dialogue_en: ...Not a single bite.
dialogue_jp: ふわあ……かからんのう

dialogue_en: I swear... You'd think there'd be some players in these waters!
dialogue_jp:
どこかに　活きのいいバウターは
おらんかのう

dialogue_en: Just one little nibble and I'd hook 'em quicker than a minnow can swim a dipper.
dialogue_jp:
食いついたら
いっきに釣りあげてやるのにのう

dialogue_en: Oh! Well, wouldja look at that. I finally hooked a catch─and a good one too!
dialogue_jp: これはこれは　面白い獲物がかかったのう

dialogue_en: Bet you thought you could blow me out of the water just 'cause I'm getting on in years, hm?
dialogue_jp: ワシのような老人なら　簡単に勝てると思ったか

dialogue_en: Well, think again.
dialogue_jp: 青いな　小僧

dialogue_en: I'm this town's ace angler─Zogan.
dialogue_jp: ワシは『一本釣りのゾガン』

dialogue_en: And I've caught much bigger QB fish than you, sonny, I tell you that much!
dialogue_jp:
活きのいいバウターを何人も
巧みにいなして　釣りあげてきたわい

dialogue_en: You young'uns can thrash all you like, but you'll never beat my years of experience.
dialogue_jp:
威勢だけの若造に
老練な技を見せてやろうかのう

dialogue_en: Alright. Back in the water you go.
dialogue_jp: しかたない　リリースしてやろう

dialogue_en: Perfect. Now, it's time to reel you in.
dialogue_jp: さて　釣りあげるとしようかのう

dialogue_en: Oh, looks like I've got myself a real lunker.
dialogue_jp: これはまた　大物がかかったのう

dialogue_en: Goodness me... This makes you the one that got away!
dialogue_jp: まさか　ワシが釣りあげ損ねるとは

dialogue_en: Serves me right for looking down on you just because you're young.
dialogue_jp: 若いと侮っていたのは　ワシのほうだったようだ

dialogue_en: Queen's Blood is a lot like fishing, y'know. Gotta be patient─wait for the right moment─then reel 'em in.
dialogue_jp:
釣りとカードバウトは似ておる
勝機を見極め　ここぞというところで竿をあげる

dialogue_en: Time it wrong, and you'll be watching your victory swim away.
dialogue_jp: タイミングを間違えれば　勝利は逃げてしまう

dialogue_en: Just look what happened to me! Guess I had a bigger catch on my hands than I thought. I should've been more careful!
dialogue_jp:
逃した魚は　予想以上に大物だったか
こりゃ　惜しいことをしたわい

dialogue_en: I tell you, hauling in a fresh youngster like yourself never gets old!
dialogue_jp: 若いバウターを釣りあげるのは　気持ちいいのう

dialogue_en: Hehehe... Y'see? Nothing escapes my hook.
dialogue_jp: くくく　狙った獲物は逃がさんよ

dialogue_en: Hmm... Guess that means we're evenly matched.
dialogue_jp: ふむ　今回は痛み分けか

dialogue_en: Never thought I'd be the one getting reeled in. Well played.
dialogue_jp: 逆に釣りあげられてしまうとは　やるのう

dialogue_en: So you're the whopper that snaps everybody's lines, huh? Okay.
dialogue_jp: この大物は　釣りあげられそうにないのう

dialogue_en: I'm a ramblin', gamblin' fella. If you wanna hear my tale I'll tell ya.
dialogue_jp:
俺は流しのカードバウター
どうか　俺の叫びを聞いていってくれ

dialogue_en: A fisherman's only child...
dialogue_jp: 漁師の子に生まれて２０年

dialogue_en: But pops and I didn't see eye to eye. So I packed it up, and I said "goodbye."
dialogue_jp:
ある日　俺は口うるさい親父と喧嘩して
魚くさい家を飛び出した

dialogue_en: "Sorry, old man, but you'll never understand!
dialogue_jp: 悪いな親父　俺には夢があるのさ！

dialogue_en: "With Queen's Blood and my guitar, I'm gonna be a star!
dialogue_jp:
ギターとクイーンズ・ブラッド
出会っちまったものはしかたがねえ

dialogue_en: "Fishing might pay the bills, but the Saucer's got all the thrills and all the gil!
dialogue_jp:
漁師なんか　まっぴらゴメンよ
目指すはゴールドソーサーのステージ

dialogue_en: "And to be frank, I wanna make bank!"
dialogue_jp: これからは　自分の腕で生きていくのさ

dialogue_en: So with my razzle dazzle, I'm gonna win all the card battles!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　今日も音楽とバウトで
おまえらを魅了するぜ！

dialogue_en: You with an agency? Here to sign me?
dialogue_jp: なんだ　もしかしてスカウトか？

dialogue_en: No, wait─you came out here just to see the famous Queen's Blood rocker!
dialogue_jp:
歌えるバウターがいるって聞きつけて
はるばる　こんな場所まで来てくれたのか？

dialogue_en:
Alright, twist my arm, why don'tcha!
I'll give you the show of a lifetime!
dialogue_jp:
まあ条件次第だが　どうしてもって言うなら
デビューしてやってもいいぜ？

dialogue_en: I'm good.
dialogue_jp: いや……

dialogue_en: Oof, savage!
dialogue_jp: ガーン！

dialogue_en:
So you're not a talent scout or a fan?
Why didn't you say something!
dialogue_jp:
なんだよ　スカウトじゃないのかよ
まぎらわしいな！

dialogue_en: The name's Neil, and I'm gonna be the world's greatest QB-playin' guitarist!
dialogue_jp:
俺は『流しのニール』
いつか大物になる　ギタリストバウターさ

dialogue_en:
Whaddya say?
Wanna play against a future celebrity?
dialogue_jp: 俺とバウトしておくと　のちのち自慢できるぜ？

dialogue_en: You'll at least stick around to listen, right?
dialogue_jp: 演奏だけでも　聴いていってくれよな

dialogue_en: Nothin' like a match after a sick jam session!
dialogue_jp: 音楽を楽しんだら　次はバウトの時間だ！

dialogue_en: One day you'll be able to brag about playing a game with me, you'll see.
dialogue_jp:
いつか　俺とバウトできたことを
自慢できる日がくるぜ

dialogue_en: Goddamn, dude! You legit wiped the floor with me!
dialogue_jp: ガーン！　負けちまった

dialogue_en: Then again, I can count on one hand the times I've won. I might actually not be cut out for this.
dialogue_jp:
思えば　勝った記憶はほとんどないな
俺ってば　才能ないのかな

dialogue_en: Huh! Hear that?
dialogue_jp: 聞こえる……

dialogue_en: An upbeat melody's coming to me, clear as day. That's it─I can feel my spirits rising!
dialogue_jp:
敗者を奮い立たせるような激しいコード進行
メロディがおりてきた

dialogue_en: I knew I was a musical genius. That loss was just what I needed to get my groove back!
dialogue_jp:
やっぱり俺は　天才ギタリストバウターだ
バウトの負けは　芸の肥やしってな

dialogue_en: Oh, I can tell this one's gonna be good.
dialogue_jp: あんたのおかげで　いい曲が生まれそうだ

dialogue_en: One of these days I'll make it to the big time and give my folks the life they deserve.
dialogue_jp:
いつかビッグになって
両親に　楽させてやりてえんだ

dialogue_en: Until then, there's nothing for it but to keep strumming guitar and playing cards.
dialogue_jp:
それまで俺は
このギターとカードで　戦い続けるぜ

dialogue_en: Hey, don't beat yourself up over it. Want me to sign something for you?
dialogue_jp:
まあ　あんまり落ち込むなよな
よかったら　サインしてやろうか？

dialogue_en: Not every day you meet a multi-hyphenate like me. Only a matter of time before I'm signed!
dialogue_jp:
バウトが強くてギターもうまい
こりゃ　スカウトが来るのも時間の問題だな

dialogue_en: Now you can say you tied against a budding star.
dialogue_jp: 将来のスターと引き分けられて　良かったな

dialogue_en: It's cool, it's cool! Losing is inspirational! I can feel the creativity flowing through me!
dialogue_jp:
いいぞ～　負ければ負けるほど
名曲が生まれてくるぜ

dialogue_en: Just gotta pour all this frustration into my music!
dialogue_jp: この悔しさを　ギターに叩きつけるぜ

dialogue_en: Hello there, everyone! I'm Michaela, a member of Crows Against Shinra.
dialogue_jp:
みなさん　こんにちは！
私は反神羅青年団のミザリーです

dialogue_en: I want to tell you how we can achieve world peace through Queen's Blood!
dialogue_jp:
世界を平和にするために
クイーンズ・ブラッドを広める活動を
しています

dialogue_en: If you could spare just a minute.
dialogue_jp: すこしお時間よろしいでしょうか！

dialogue_en: Trust me: there's no game better for conducting negotiations than Queen's Blood!
dialogue_jp:
私の知る限りクイーンズ・ブラッドほど
交渉に最適なゲームはありません

dialogue_en: Because what is negotiation if not sitting down together and putting your cards on the table?
dialogue_jp:
テーブルで向かいあいカードを出しあう
これこそ　交渉ではないでしょうか！

dialogue_en: I guarantee there are QB players within Shinra.
dialogue_jp:
神羅の中にも
カードバウターは必ずいます

dialogue_en: So if we set up a match, I know they'd be willing to engage with us.
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドでなら　きっと
神羅もテーブルについてくれるはず

dialogue_en: QB is the perfect way to bridge the gap!
dialogue_jp: バウトを通じて　神羅と話しあうのです

dialogue_en: What do you say, folks? Why not brush up on your skills by playing against me first?
dialogue_jp:
みなさん　まずは私と戦って
クイーンズ・ブラッドに
触れてみませんか？

dialogue_en: Let's show our passion through our cards, and make Shinra listen!
dialogue_jp:
ぜひ　カードに想いを乗せて
神羅へ届けましょう！

dialogue_en: Hello!
dialogue_jp: こんにちは！

dialogue_en: My name's Michaela, and I'm a proud member of the CAS's Queen's Blood Promotion Committee!
dialogue_jp:
私は反神羅青年団所属
『クイーンズ・ブラッド推進委員のミザリー』です

dialogue_en: Our goal's to spread awareness about the game's diplomatic potential!
dialogue_jp:
みなさんに　クイーンズ・ブラッドを
知ってもらうために　活動をしています

dialogue_en: We believe it's our best shot at getting Shinra to agree to negotiations with us.
dialogue_jp:
ゆくゆくは神羅と
カードバウトを通じて交渉するつもりです

dialogue_en:
Whaddya say?
Wanna play and help me drum up interest?
dialogue_jp: ぜひ　啓蒙活動にご協力ください！

dialogue_en:
You're welcome to come back anytime.
Just say the word if you wanna go a round!
dialogue_jp:
いつでも大歓迎なんで
気が向いたら　声をかけてくださいね！

dialogue_en: Let's spread the word about Queen's Blood together!
dialogue_jp:
いっしょに
クイーンズ・ブラッドを広めましょう！

dialogue_en: A round or two would really help the cause.
dialogue_jp: カードバウトで　世界を平和にしましょう！

dialogue_en: That was great!
dialogue_jp: すばらしい！

dialogue_en: See what I'm talking about? That connection you feel when you're playing someone!
dialogue_jp:
テーブルで向かいあってカードを交わすことで
通じあえた気がします

dialogue_en: You, my friend, are now officially a member of the Queen's Blood Promotion Committee.
dialogue_jp:
これで　あなたも同志
クイーンズ・ブラッド推進委員の一員です！

dialogue_en: People laugh, but I really think this game has the power to bring folks together in a way few things can.
dialogue_jp:
私　クイーンズ・ブラッドでなら
どんな人とも　友達になれると思うんですよ

dialogue_en: 'Cause the key to world peace isn't violence. It's joy. Plain and simple joy.
dialogue_jp:
世界を平和に導くには
武力ではなく　遊びが必要なんです

dialogue_en: Comrade! I hereby ask you to go forth and play Queen's Blood─spread the joy of gaming!
dialogue_jp:
同志よ　世界中でバウトをして
この楽しい遊びを広めてくれたまえ！

dialogue_en: I'm counting on you!
dialogue_jp: よろしく頼んだぞ！

dialogue_en: Win or lose, you still stand to gain a good friend.
dialogue_jp: 勝っても負けても　バウトをすれば友達です！

dialogue_en: It's almost like our cards were speaking for us, right?
dialogue_jp: カードを通じて　たくさんお話できましたね

dialogue_en: Whew... Now that was an intense game.
dialogue_jp: ふう　白熱のバウトでしたね

dialogue_en: Nice one. I knew you'd give me a good match.
dialogue_jp: さすがは同志　ナイスバウトです

dialogue_en: Damn... Losing's still rough, even if it is to a fellow freedom fighter.
dialogue_jp:
ぐぬぬ……
同志とはいえ　負けると悔しいです

dialogue_en: Okay, Riana! Now─give me a look like you're ready to throw down.
dialogue_jp:
は～いリアナ　こっち向いて
バウターを挑発するように

dialogue_en:
Oh yeah, that's perfect.
Next, let's have you look over here.
dialogue_jp:
あら　いまの表情グッドよ
次は視線をこっちに

dialogue_en: Give me a little more "vacay." Really bask in those rays!
dialogue_jp:
ほら　コスタ・デル・ソルの日射しを
もっと全身で感じて！

dialogue_en: 'Scuse me, we're shooting here!
dialogue_jp: ちょっとあなた　撮影中よ！

dialogue_en: W-wait!
dialogue_jp: 待って！

dialogue_en: Do you play Queen's Blood? You kinda look like you do.
dialogue_jp:
もしかして　お兄さん
カードバウターですか？

dialogue_en: Omigosh, this is perfect.
dialogue_jp: やった　ラッキー！

dialogue_en: I'm Riana, an up-and-coming model.
dialogue_jp: わたしは『新人モデルのリアナ』

dialogue_en: We're actually getting pics for a feature right now.
dialogue_jp: 実は　写真集の目玉として

dialogue_en: And I was really hoping to nab one of me playing Queen's Blood.
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドをしているシーンを
撮りたいと思ってたんです

dialogue_en: You literally couldn't have come at a better time!
dialogue_jp: お兄さんなら　相手にピッタリ

dialogue_en: Whaddaya say? Help a girl out?
dialogue_jp: よかったら　協力してくれませんか？

dialogue_en:
Yeah, I get it.
You've got other things to do.
dialogue_jp: そっか～　お忙しいんですね

dialogue_en: Oh, hey! Got time for a match?
dialogue_jp: やる気になってくれました？

dialogue_en: Don't worry: I'll make sure they get some killer shots of you too!
dialogue_jp: お兄さんの姿も撮影させてもらいますね！

dialogue_en: Ugh... Gross.
dialogue_jp: くやしい～！

dialogue_en: That intense stare... That knitted brow... Glistening perspiration... Perfection!
dialogue_jp:
真剣な眼差し　悔しそうに歪んだ眉
額から落ちる汗……パーフェクトよ！

dialogue_en: I've never seen you look more beautiful!
dialogue_jp: いままでにない　リアナの表情が撮れたわ！

dialogue_en:
And you, Mister Cardsharp.
Talk about a hunky diamond in the rough!
dialogue_jp:
そして　あなた！
予想外だわ　こんな原石が転がっているなんて

dialogue_en: Have you ever thought about becoming a model?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　あなた
モデルになる気はない？

dialogue_en: Moa, you're a genius!
dialogue_jp: それ　いいかも！

dialogue_en: We could team up! Be a card-slinging, catwalk-strutting duo!
dialogue_jp:
カードバウトモデルとして
わたしといっしょに　活動しましょうよ！

dialogue_en:
You and me, taking over the world.
Whaddya say?
dialogue_jp: お兄さんなら　すぐに人気が出ると思います

dialogue_en: No.
dialogue_jp: 断る

dialogue_en: Harsh.
dialogue_jp: ええっ！

dialogue_en: We'll be kicking it here for a bit if you change your mind─after all, a model's work is never done.
dialogue_jp:
わたし　しばらく撮影してるんで
気が向いたら　また遊びにきてくださいね

dialogue_en: Shut. Up. I won!? Welp, I'm sure we got the shot we needed. Thanks a million!
dialogue_jp:
やった～　勝てた～！
いい写真が撮れました　ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: That frustrated face you're making? Super cute.
dialogue_jp: 悔しがるお兄さんも　しっかり撮れましたよ

dialogue_en: Boring. Losing woulda been better...
dialogue_jp: 引き分けだと　ちょっと地味ですね

dialogue_en: As much as it kills me to lose, at least we got some dope shots.
dialogue_jp:
負けたのはくやしいけど
いい写真集になりそうです

dialogue_en: Winning looks good on you, bitch. For real, get into the modeling biz. You'd clean up!
dialogue_jp:
なんてスマートな勝ちっぷり
やっぱりお兄さん　モデルに向いてますよ

dialogue_en: Oh, man, this is impossible! How am I supposed to choose which of my babies to use when they're all so adorable?
dialogue_jp:
ああ　どの子も可愛いな～
どの子を使おうか　迷っちゃうよ

dialogue_en: At this rate, it's gonna take me the whole day just to assemble my deck! But hey, time flies when you're having fun, I guess.
dialogue_jp:
デッキを組むだけで日が暮れちゃうよ～
まあ　それが楽しいんだけどね

dialogue_en: I can't wait to show off all my precious babies. Only problem is, I'll need someone to play against first.
dialogue_jp:
自慢の子たちを　誰かに見せたいな～
バウトしてくれる人いないかな

dialogue_en:
Oh man, you've got perfect timing.
Wanna go a round against my little angels here?
dialogue_jp:
あなた　いいところに来ましたね
ボクの子たちと　バウトしていきませんか？

dialogue_en: Name's Dokaccha. I believe in my cards and they believe in me! We're like a big, happy family.
dialogue_jp:
ボクは『溺愛のドカッチャ』
カードを愛し　カードに愛されるバウターです

dialogue_en: You wanna know how I got them to love me?
dialogue_jp: カードに愛されるコツは　ただひとつ！

dialogue_en: With praise! "You're so cute," "You're so cool!" You gotta show 'em every day how much you care!
dialogue_jp:
毎日　かわいいね　かっこいいね～と
愛情をこめて声をかけてあげること！

dialogue_en: But I also wanna tell 'em how strong and hardworking they are too, y'know? Which is why I've been looking high and low for someone I can play against.
dialogue_jp:
そろそろ　強いね　がんばったね～と
ほめてあげたいので　対戦をお願いします

dialogue_en: Oh yeah, I completely understand not wanting to see your babies get hurt. I struggle with that all the time. No worries!
dialogue_jp:
我が子を戦場に出したくない気持ち
とてもよくわかります

dialogue_en: Okay little ones, shall we show him how brave you are?
dialogue_jp: お兄さんに　みんなの勇姿を見てもらおうね～

dialogue_en:
See? He'd be happy to play with you all.
Isn't he so nice?
dialogue_jp:
ほ～ら　お兄さんが
みんなと遊んでくれるって

dialogue_en: Nooo! My poor, poor babies!
dialogue_jp: ボクのかわいい子たちが～～～！

dialogue_en: ...As much as I hate to admit it, it seems you have a much stronger bond with your cards than I do.
dialogue_jp:
悔しいですが　あなたのほうが
カードに愛されているようです

dialogue_en: Just what do you say to them to get them to love you so much?
dialogue_jp: いったい　どんな言葉をかけてあげてるんですか？

dialogue_en: Huh. So you let your actions speak louder than your words? I see...
dialogue_jp:
なるほど　背中で語るタイプなんですね
勉強になりました

dialogue_en: By the way, on a completely different subject, have you ever heard of the card: the Shadowblood Queen? Apparently there's only one.
dialogue_jp:
そうだ　世界で１枚しかないレアカード
『黒紅の女王』が出回ってるって噂　聞きました？

dialogue_en: I tell you, if that's true, I hope I get the chance to see it in person someday.
dialogue_jp:
もし　それが本当なら
いちどでいいから　見てみたいですよね

dialogue_en: I bet it's the most beautiful card anyone's ever laid eyes on.
dialogue_jp: きっと　とんでもなく美しいんだろうな～

dialogue_en:
So what did you think of my little angels?
They put in work every turn, don't they?
dialogue_jp:
うちの子たちは　いかがでした？
がんばり屋さんばかりでしょ～

dialogue_en: How did you like my prized collection? Aren't my babies just the cutest, strongest cards you've ever met?
dialogue_jp:
どうですか　ボクの自慢のコレクション
みんな　かわいくて強いでしょ～

dialogue_en: I guess that proves all cards are made equal.
dialogue_jp: カードに優劣はないってことですね！

dialogue_en: Your cards are positively beaming! Don't forget to shower them with love for that victory.
dialogue_jp:
カードの喜ぶ声が聞こえます
ぜひ　ねぎらってあげてくださいね

dialogue_en: It's clear your cards have the utmost trust in you. I'm so jealous!
dialogue_jp:
カードに信頼されていますね
うらやましいです

dialogue_en: Is there anyone out there who can rekindle my fighting spirit?
dialogue_jp:
俺の闘争心に
火をつけてくれるヤツはいないのか？

dialogue_en: I'm sick of running on the beach all day, every day! Ugh, I need to go a round if I ever want to get out of this funk.
dialogue_jp:
浜辺ダッシュは　もうウンザリだ
気分転換に誰か相手してくんねえかな

dialogue_en: I just wish I had a chance to go all out in a hardcore game of Queen's Blood.
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドなら
相手をボコボコにしちまってもいいよな

dialogue_en: What're you looking at? You want a piece of me or something?
dialogue_jp: なんだ　俺とやりあうつもりか？

dialogue_en: Easy now. I didn't mean it like that. No need to be so on edge.
dialogue_jp:
そんなに警戒すんなって
荒っぽいマネをするつもりはないよ

dialogue_en: Name's Maahir─though some call me the "Child of the Sun." I'm training to be a boxer.
dialogue_jp:
俺は『太陽の子マコイ』
コスタで減量中のボクサーだ

dialogue_en: I've not been feeling it lately, so I'm trying other ways to motivate myself.
dialogue_jp:
いまは　クイーンズ・ブラッドで
闘争心を研ぎ澄ませているところさ

dialogue_en: Like Queen's Blood. I don't suppose you're up for a game?
dialogue_jp:
なあ　よかったら
相手になってくれないか？

dialogue_en: No problem. But if you're ever in the mood, come see me.
dialogue_jp:
オーケー
気分が乗ったら　また声をかけてくれ

dialogue_en: Oh hey! Are you here for a blazing hot showdown?
dialogue_jp: 俺の闘争心に火をつけてくれるのかい？

dialogue_en: I expect a match as fiery as the sand on this beach!
dialogue_jp: コスタの砂浜のように　熱いバウトを頼むぜ

dialogue_en: Ouch...! What a knockout. You got me.
dialogue_jp:
アウチ！
ハハッ　悔しいがノックアウトだ

dialogue_en: Not only was your defense on point, but your offense was swift and brutal. I've never played such an intense game.
dialogue_jp:
一糸乱れぬ堅い守備に　隙を逃さない洞察力
重さと速さを兼ね備えたキレのある一撃

dialogue_en: It was hotter than the sun─enough to light a fire in my soul, even! I think I'm finally out of my funk!
dialogue_jp:
太陽のように熱く刺激的なバウトだったぜ
おかげで　闘争心に火がついたよ

dialogue_en: And now I can get back to boxing. Thank you.
dialogue_jp: いい状態で試合にのぞめそうだ　ありがとよ

dialogue_en: And here I thought you'd burn so much brighter than that. Well, it is what it is.
dialogue_jp:
もっと熱くしてくれるかと思ったが
まあ　こんなもんか

dialogue_en: Man, it feels like I've been hit with a bucket of ice water.
dialogue_jp: なんだか　熱が冷めちまったな

dialogue_en: We managed a few embers, but I wanna burn...
dialogue_jp: ドローか　不完全燃焼だぜ

dialogue_en: You don't disappoint! That fight was hot!
dialogue_jp: くう～　相変わらず熱いバウトをしやがる

dialogue_en: Thanks for sharing your burning passion with me. I needed it.
dialogue_jp:
おまえの熱　分けてもらったよ
サンキューな

dialogue_en: Woof! Woof!
dialogue_jp: ばう　ばう！

dialogue_en: What's wrong? Why're you barking so much?
dialogue_jp:
どうした？
そんなに吠えるなって

dialogue_en: Is it because you smell a Queen's Blood player?
dialogue_jp:
もしかして
カードバウターのニオイがするのか？

dialogue_en: Woof!
dialogue_jp: ばう！

dialogue_en:
Oh, don't mind Rolf here.
He's just a bit worked up is all.
dialogue_jp:
ごめんね　ロルフが吠えちゃって
さっきから落ち着かなくてね

dialogue_en: Wait... Do you play Queen's Blood?
dialogue_jp: お兄さん　もしかしてカードバウター？

dialogue_en:
Rolf gets really excited whenever
he senses a skilled player nearby.
dialogue_jp:
ロルフは　強いバウターを見つけると
興奮して吠えちゃうんだよ

dialogue_en: Woof!
dialogue_jp: ばう！

dialogue_en:
You may find this hard to believe,
but he's the world's only canine competitor─and he's pretty good too!
dialogue_jp:
こいつは『ドッグファイターのロルフ』
世界で１匹しかいない　犬のバウターさ

dialogue_en: Woof! Woof!
dialogue_jp: ばう　ばう！

dialogue_en: Heh, he's saying he wants to go a round with you. Well, you game?
dialogue_jp:
ロルフが『お兄さんとバウトがしたい』って
どう　やってく？

dialogue_en: Hnnn...
dialogue_jp: く～ん……

dialogue_en: Aw, bummer. Well, come back if you ever wanna play!
dialogue_jp:
そっか　気が向いたら
また遊んでやってよ

dialogue_en: Rolf says that he'd love to play with you!
dialogue_jp: ロルフが『お兄さんと勝負したい』って

dialogue_en: Looks like he's really happy to have met you.
dialogue_jp: お兄さんと会えて　嬉しがってるみたい

dialogue_en: Aroo...
dialogue_jp: く～ん……

dialogue_en: Uh-oh. Someone's a sore loser.
dialogue_jp: あらら　ふてくされちゃった

dialogue_en: But you gotta admit─he's pretty good, right? Amazing even.
dialogue_jp:
でも　どうだった？
うちのロルフ　強かったろ

dialogue_en: Rolf is actually scheduled to make his television debut! They're doing a special on animals who can play Queen's Blood.
dialogue_jp:
実はオレたち　今度テレビに出るんだ
バウトができる動物特集をやるんだって

dialogue_en: And, once we get famous, we can finally kiss this town goodbye!
dialogue_jp:
テレビに出て　有名になったら
こんな村ともおさらばさ

dialogue_en: We got this. Right, Rolf?
dialogue_jp: いっしょに頑張ろうな　ロルフ

dialogue_en: Woof!
dialogue_jp: ばう！

dialogue_en: Betcha underestimated him 'cause he's a dog, huh?
dialogue_jp: ロルフが犬だからって　油断したでしょ？

dialogue_en: Joke's on you. Rolf's so good he could win tournaments! Could make good money that way too, I bet...
dialogue_jp:
ロルフなら　大会で優勝できるかもね
そしたら賞金が……

dialogue_en: Rolf says you're not half bad for a human. He'd love to play another round if you're game!
dialogue_jp:
ロルフが
『人間にしては　なかなかやるな』だって

dialogue_en: ...Guess Rolf and I have some work to do before that big TV appearance.
dialogue_jp:
う～ん　テレビに出るまえに
もっと鍛えないとダメかな

dialogue_en: You must be really talented to beat him like that. I couldn't win against him no matter how hard I tried!
dialogue_jp:
オレよりずっと強いロルフが負けるなんて
お兄さん　ただものじゃないね

dialogue_en: Watch out, shitheads! A new bandit's in town, and he ain't messin' around!
dialogue_jp:
泣く子も黙るバグラー様が
はるばるやってきたぜ！

dialogue_en: I play for keeps─you'll see! And when we're through, I'll be keepin' all your gil!
dialogue_jp:
アウトローのバウトを見せつけてやるぜ
負けたら　ミグルミを置いていきな！

dialogue_en: Hehehehe! Look at these chickens. That's right, you better run!
dialogue_jp:
ケケケ　オレがアウトローすぎて
誰も寄ってきやしねえぜ！

dialogue_en: What're you lookin' at? If you got somethin' to say, then spit it out!
dialogue_jp:
なんだてめえ
オレがだれか　わかってんのか？

dialogue_en: Just know that I'm such a badass that even Beck and his Bitches couldn't handle me! Kicked me out of their stupid little gang!
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルのアウトロー集団
ベグ盗賊団を追放された　悪党の中の悪党

dialogue_en: That's right! You're standing face-to-face with the legendary Biff!
dialogue_jp: 『アウトサイダーのビーガ』とは　オレのことよ！

dialogue_en: You shakin' in your boots yet?
dialogue_jp: どうだ　ビビったか！

dialogue_en: Uhhh... Tough guy, huh? Respect.
dialogue_jp: おお　なかなか肝が据わってるな……

dialogue_en: But it seems to me like we got no choice but to settle this with a game of Queen's Blood!
dialogue_jp:
いいぜ　こうなったら
バウトで決着つけようじゃねえか！

dialogue_en: And if I whoop your ass, you gotta give me three─No! Seven whole gil!
dialogue_jp:
いいか　負けたら３……いや
７ギルもらうからな！

dialogue_en: Yeah, you ain't so tough after all!
dialogue_jp: なんだあ　逃げんのか？

dialogue_en: Huh? Hold up. You tellin' me you ain't got seven gil?
dialogue_jp:
おお？　おまえ
７ギルも持ってないのか？

dialogue_en: Oh, well... Damn... That's rough.
dialogue_jp: そっか　なんか……ごめんな

dialogue_en: Hey! We gonna go a round or what? And don't forget: you gotta pony up seven gil when you lose!
dialogue_jp:
おっ　勝負するか？
負けたら７ギル　忘れんじゃねえぞ！

dialogue_en: So, you got the balls to take on the legend himself? Remember: lose and ya owe me seven gil!
dialogue_jp:
ビーガ様が相手だ
いいか　負けたら７ギルだからな！

dialogue_en: Ahhh! How could I lose!?
dialogue_jp: がああ　負けた～～～！

dialogue_en: Wanna know a secret? Truth is, I bailed from the bandit life 'cause I just couldn't hack it.
dialogue_jp:
実はよ　オレ
盗賊稼業が肌に合わなくて逃げ出したんだ

dialogue_en: So I...I figured I'd turn over a new leaf and become a Queen's Blood player instead, but turns out I'm no good at that neither.
dialogue_jp:
そんで　足を洗って心機一転
バウターになったのに　ぜんぜん勝てなくてよ

dialogue_en:
You gotta tell me. What's the trick, man?
How do I get your kinda skills?
dialogue_jp:
なあ　どうやったら強くなれんだ？
教えてくれよ

dialogue_en: What, don't like handin' out free advice or somethin'? Only a real cheapskate would charge for that shit, asshole.
dialogue_jp:
なんだよ　タダでは教えたくねえってか
なんて野郎だ　カネの亡者め！

dialogue_en: Well, better hang on to that gil of yours, 'cause next time we meet, I'mma take seven off you for sure!
dialogue_jp:
チクショウ　覚えてやがれ
つぎは絶対に７ギルぶんどってやるからな！

dialogue_en: Hahahaha... That's what you get for messin' with the legend.
dialogue_jp:
ひひひ……
ビーガ様にかかれば　こんなもんよ

dialogue_en: Hahaha... I'm gonna be drinkin' good tonight!
dialogue_jp: けけけ　今日はうまい酒が飲めそうだ

dialogue_en: A tie!? That's bullshit.
dialogue_jp: 引き分けかよ　チクショウ！

dialogue_en: Am I really that hopeless?
dialogue_jp: オレって　才能ねえのかな

dialogue_en: Maybe I'd be better off givin' up on Queen's Blood too.
dialogue_jp: カードバウトからも足を洗おうかな

dialogue_en: Come one and all to see the living statue who plays Queen's Blood. It's a sight to behold.
dialogue_jp:
バウトをする彫像ですよ
どうぞ　ごらんくださ～い

dialogue_en: Feel free to look as looong as you want. And if you like what you see, consider leaving a tip.
dialogue_jp:
お代は見てのお楽しみ
じっくりながめていってくださ～い

dialogue_en: Amazing, isn't it? I don't move a single muscle.
dialogue_jp:
ほらほら～
ピクリとも動きませんよ～

dialogue_en:
Huh? May I help you?
I'm in the middle of a performance.
dialogue_jp:
なんですか？
いま　パフォーマンス中です

dialogue_en: Are you...here to play Queen's Blood?
dialogue_jp: もしかして　クイーンズ・ブラッドですか？

dialogue_en: That's going to be tricky. I'm a living statue, you see. I'm not supposed to move under any circumstances.
dialogue_jp:
う～ん困ったな　ぼくは『不動のポピーノ』
動くわけにはいかないんだけどな～

dialogue_en: ...Well, I guess I could move my arms at least.
dialogue_jp: しかたない　腕だけ解放するか

dialogue_en: You're going to regret making me come to life.
dialogue_jp:
くくく　ぼくを動かしたことを
後悔しますよ

dialogue_en: Then please, enjoy the performance.
dialogue_jp: それじゃあ　パフォーマンスに戻りますね

dialogue_en: Oh! Do you want to play?
dialogue_jp: バウトしますか？

dialogue_en: Is it time for me to move my arms again?
dialogue_jp: 腕を動かす時がきたようですね

dialogue_en:
You completely demolished me.
Well played, good sir.
dialogue_jp: 完敗です　お兄さん　やりますね

dialogue_en:
But my performance wasn't half bad,
wouldn't you agree?
dialogue_jp:
でも　ぼくのパフォーマンスも
なかなか良かったでしょ？

dialogue_en: Someday, I hope to join the Gold Saucer's grand stable of performers.
dialogue_jp:
ゆくゆくは　ゴールドソーサー専属の
パフォーマーになりたいんですよね

dialogue_en: That's why I'm trying to hone my skills by purposely putting myself in the harshest of environments.
dialogue_jp:
そのために　いまはあえて
厳しい環境に身を置いて腕を磨いています

dialogue_en: But my winning streak was starting to draw negative attention, so maybe losing was for the best.
dialogue_jp:
ただ　ちょっと勝ちすぎて悪目立ちしていたので
負けて良かったのかもしれません

dialogue_en: I'll be here for a while yet. If you would like to play another game, just let me know.
dialogue_jp:
ぼくは　ずっとここにいるんで
また遊びたくなったら　声をかけてください

dialogue_en: No one stands a chance of beating me once I come to life.
dialogue_jp: 腕を解放したぼくに　勝てる者などいません

dialogue_en: Hehe... Bet you didn't see that coming.
dialogue_jp: くくく　ぼくを動かすからですよ

dialogue_en: A draw? Well...color me impressed.
dialogue_jp: 動いたぼくと引き分けるなんて　やりますね

dialogue_en:
I'm a living statue.
Even if I lose, I'll show no distress.
dialogue_jp:
ぼくは不動のポピーノ
負けて悔しくても　動きませんよ

dialogue_en:
Not many can defeat me once I come to life.
Well done.
dialogue_jp: 腕を解放したぼくに勝つなんて　やりますね

dialogue_en: Hey, come on... Anyone up for a few rounds of Queen's Blood between drinks? It'll be fun!
dialogue_jp:
ねえねえ
誰か酒のツマミにバウトしない？

dialogue_en: Wanna know my secret to victory? It sounds like "Glug, glug, glug!"
dialogue_jp:
酔えば酔うほど強くなる
それが　私のバウト道

dialogue_en: Ugh... What, no takers? Boo. You guys are no fun at all.
dialogue_jp:
あ～あ　絡みたいのに
ロクな相手がいな～い

dialogue_en:
Hm...?
Ooh! Where've you been, handsome?
dialogue_jp:
う～ん？
おっ　いい男じゃん！

dialogue_en:
I take it you're here to join me for a drink?
Well, aren't you the sweetest little thing!
dialogue_jp:
私に話しかけたってことは
いっしょに飲みたいってことだよね？

dialogue_en:
Ugh... You big party pooper. Fine, be that way.
Guess we'll play Queen's Blood instead!
dialogue_jp:
ふ～ん断るんだ
じゃ　クイーンズ・ブラッドで勝負だね

dialogue_en: Oh, no. Don't even try to wiggle out of it.
dialogue_jp: ふふふ　飲んでいる私に声をかけたのが運のツキ

dialogue_en: Because I'm Mary, darling dear. And when I've knocked a few back, nobody slips through my fingers.
dialogue_jp:
私は『絡み酒のラム』
酔ってる私から逃げられた人はいないの

dialogue_en:
So...either ya take a drink, or we play a game.
Your choice.
dialogue_jp:
さあ　１杯飲むか
バウトするか選んで

dialogue_en: Oho, someone knows how to have a good time!
dialogue_jp: おお　いい飲みっぷり！

dialogue_en:
That won't getcha drunk, though.
It was just a vegetable smoothie.
dialogue_jp:
安心しなさい
それ　健康ジュースだから
